Review.Titre: Don’t bother
Review.Contenu: My experience with Asurion was a total clownshow. I made an appointment online to fix my desktop computer (Ispecifying the model) drive my hardware to their location, just to be told by the teenager with dead fish eyes that they don’t fix computers. At this location or any location? She dunno. I try calling different locations but whatever option I chose on the voicemail the call was immediately disconnected. Total waste of time, don’t bother.

Review.Titre: unable to return unit
Review.Contenu: Unit was returned a second time then deemed unrepairable. I was unable to back it up before sending it in because it was never fixed when I got it back initially. ask for just the hard drive to be returned to me was told no then when I asked for the entire unit to be returned to me and I would go ahead and pass on the replacement they said that they might not be able to do that either.

Review.Titre: I made a claim and they came up with…
Review.Contenu: I made a claim and they came up with excuses, it's the worst treatment that a company can give you, for that reason I'm better off canceling this insurance because it's not worth it, they're just excuses, it's not worth my time. Horrible service. my number #4049970709

Review.Titre: NOT TRUSTWORTHY
Review.Contenu: I filed a claim and never recieved my chequeOn Oct 9, 2023, at 10:04 PM, Asurion < wrote:AsurionSorry to hear about your product.We're sending you a reimbursement.I have not gotten anything and we are going into 2024

Review.Titre: If I could give a 0 rating I would
Review.Contenu: If I could give a 0 rating I would. Phone was lost Nov. 20th.  After jumping through hoops, 30 min interview and many delays.  I finally received a replacement Dec 14 almost a month later.  What if this phone was needed for business? I would not recommend this company to my worst enemy

Review.Titre: Asurion is a scam!
Review.Contenu: I’ve been with Asurion Home + for a couple tears and have never filed a claim. Recently my television broke, so I called Asurion and they informed me they don’t cover televisions! Yet, on their website it has a picture of a television and states they DO cover them! Asurion is a waste of money and an obvious scam!

Review.Titre: Customer service was good service itself poor.
Review.Contenu: Customer service was good. But claims process is terrible and frustrating. Filed a claim 2 times and they keep telling me to refile it. Then they tell you to call the number and put on hold for an excruciating hold process with terrible music.

Review.Titre: TOTAL CHEATS!!!
Review.Contenu: TOTAL CHEATS!I agree with all of the other negative reviews - I was supposed to get $175 back. They told me that my phone was damaged, which it was not when I sent it, and said that it was only worth $10!! They are refusing to honour the payment... THEY SHOULD BE SHUT DOWN

Review.Titre: Asurion Home Plus SCAM
Review.Contenu: I filed a claim in July 2023 after having the service for a couple of months for a TV that would no longer turn on. I was told in December 2023 after jumping through so many hoops that because the TV would not turn on, there is no way to know if the damage is covered by the service. My claim was denied for something I told several representatives about months ago. Stay away from this horrible company

Review.Titre: I had a horrible experience with them, do not recommend
Review.Contenu: I had a horrible experience with Asurion.   Nearly took them to court.  They violated the warranty and I had to obtain assistance to get them to refund both the cost of my warranty and a refund for my laptop.  This took a long time.   I'm still stuck with the cost of my temporary laptop that I had to purchase because they took too long to replace the one under warranty.  Cannot recommend them to anyone.

Review.Titre: Scam
Review.Contenu: Scam.  Give you the runaround and do not send the phone.  I tried to pay their ridiculous replacement fee and they are now making me resubmit documents for the claim.  Illegal scam. Scam. Scam

Review.Titre: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE!!
Review.Contenu: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE!!! They do not care about your product nor about your protection plan. They think i will give up but i wont.

Review.Titre: a east indian nightmare
Review.Contenu: a east indian nightmare, i had to make a bbb complaint, a amazon complaint and i am trying to get a class action started...they delay hoping you will abandon claim, if you get a east indian keep hanging up until you get a human.

Review.Titre: wrong  product
Review.Contenu: This company ,really  take people for fool .I cant believe this. After going  back  and forth  with  them for a week  to get my  replacement device send. They  have they audacity  to send me the wrong product .The  package   was already  open as well upon delivery. Why such  a headache ?.But they take their money  at the end of the month ,there is never a problem .Please do  not trust  this company, Their agent are rude ,the don't keep their word , and their agent don't deliver package instead keep it for them self . Please stay away , this is a scam . Also  they  respond at you review as if the will do  something  but nothing  is done .This company  should not even be allowed to run .

Review.Titre: Unprofessional
Review.Contenu: I am very disappointed in asurion. They set me up twice for an appointment and twice no show. No calls no messages. Very unprofessional.

Review.Titre: This place is a scam.
Review.Contenu: And if it isn’t a scam, it is an absolute joke... I’m not sure what you could possibly have to do to make paying for this insurance worth your time. They basically collect your money monthly, and charge you an insane amount you when things actually go wrong.I had an old phone that needed replaced. They were going to charge me $300. My phone was an 11 X pro, which is a little bit older and it was more because of that.I ended up going into AT&T where they were running a promotion which was MUCH cheaper than using the insurance that I’ve been paying for..And even more frustrating, it took hours on the phone before and after, only for them to tell me that basically they don’t care. And unless you’re willing to have a customer rep repeat to you over and over again why they are unwilling to help you, just skip getting customer service at all..You will not be able to get a supervisor on the phone.

Review.Titre: I recently filed claim for their home…
Review.Contenu: I recently filed claim for their home protection plan it was instantly denied. The explanation was very vague and not detailed. They did not investigate at all they just told me it wasn’t covered “the reported breakdown occured outside of your protection plan's coverage period”. Which isn’t true at all this is my first time filing claim and I have been paying for this service for months. Bad customer service in this situation.

Review.Titre: A waste of your time and money
Review.Contenu: A waste of your time and money, you come out cheaper paying for apple care, abd their phones are hella not worth what you pay for. And they know it complete rip off

Review.Titre: Waste of money
Review.Contenu: Put in a claim thursday 19th October was told I could get replacement next day for £85 excess. I agreed then took protective cover off waiting for replacement and dropped my phone. I've been fobbed off as today 30th october I'm still waiting for my replacement.

Review.Titre: Not great...
Review.Contenu: I've dealt with assurion for cell phone claims before and they have been great... but my laptop repair was a disaster. They requested I take it to a store. The store tells me it will be repaired in 5 to 7 days. But instead of repairing it, they shipped it somewhere else. No phone call, no email, no communication. It's been 3 weeks, and still no communication from them. I have to call and chat to find out details. Meanwhile, my online college student is without a laptop.

Review.Titre: They will not help with an older phone
Review.Contenu: If you have an older phone, they won’t fix it even if all it needs is a new battery. I stopped paying for Asurion insurance after being a customer for years because they wouldn’t help through calls or email. I went to Battery Joe and they replaced the battery for $27 and it works perfectly. Much better option than Asurion. Asurion would not replace my phone but made an appointment to replace the battery but did not show up. I spent hours on hold since I had paid for years into this insurance and had rarely used it. I was passed on to another hold after speaking to each representative. Very disappointing.

Review.Titre: waste of time
Review.Contenu: I have been waiting since August for my claim to be completed. It’s December 1 This company is not to be taken seriously.

Review.Titre: I would not do business with this company
Review.Contenu: I’ve had to call this company back 7 times now with no results in replacing my lost phone. I did everything they asked me to do, including uploading my ID twice, calling my phone provider to make adjustments to the name on the coverage plan. They keep coming up with more questions and requests. As a large business owner, I know when a company doesn’t want to make good on their offer. I would NOT recommend anyone to take their warranty and I will post this on Google and social media.

Review.Titre: Trying to sell more insurance before they paid out a claim
Review.Contenu: My claim was denied even though my phone was stolen. Then when I called to ask questions, I was given a sales pitch for more products and the representative wouldn't pass my call on until I bought a plan to insure all the electronic devices in my house.  When I didn't, he disconnected the call.

Review.Titre: They are horrible to deal with!!!
Review.Contenu: They are horrible to deal with! I must have called them at least 20 times. They will do anything in their power to deny your claim. Why even purchase a warranty if they are the judge, jury, and executioners? CPS on the other hand is awesome! I bought a warranty from CPS when I dropped an expensive camera I purchased off Mercai. I sent them the pictures, explained what happened, and within a matter of a week I had the replacement funds in my PayPal account. Buying a warranty from Asurion is like flushing your money down the toilet! :(

Review.Titre: Absolutely the worst
Review.Contenu: Absolutely the worst! We filled a claim in October .  They sent us a purple phone.  We called and said we don’t want a purple phone and we were told to send the one we received back. So we did.  They received the phone and confirmed they received it November 1. They then charged me $250 on the December bill.  I called because the phone and claim had already been canceled and returned. The representative told me that I was supposed to call them and tell them I wanted a refund.  Ummm… we sent the phone back…. Why would I have paid $250 and sent the phone back and then not wanted a refund? Now the saying d it will be 1-2 months BEFORE I GET MY MONEY BACK!  Do not use this company for insurance! There are other better options (Apple Care for Apple products is one suggestion ).  The lady said if I wouldn’t have called they would have kept my $250… because they don’t “track” if they received the phone back!

Review.Titre: UNACCEPTABLE
Review.Contenu: Received a replacement phone through Asurion/Verizon   Phone was delivered to our home.  The phone being replaced (due to damage) was being used at a different location.  By one of my children!!!  Service was cut off!!  UNACCEPTABLE!!!  This  is one of my CHILDREN'S phones.  The delivery person was told that the phone was not available to be activated at the time of delivery.    They chose to DEACTIVATE the phone!  So my child had no phone for hours...no way to contact them!!  I just switched from TMOBIL to VERIZON...going back!

Review.Titre: please don't get this
Review.Contenu: I don't even know where to  start this was a headache from the beginning .I am a person that took care of my  phone so when my  note 9  cracked in 2023 ,I understand the fact that Samsung  wasn't making  it anymore .So the agent told me that  they will get  me a new phone , and I was asked to paid the deductible ,I did so . We schedule a same day  delivery  .I was excited receiving  my  new device , I spent the whole day at home waiting  for a so  call Asurion agent , nobody  show up .out of the bleu My  old phone stop working. When I reach  out to Verizon  ,I was told that,  it was Asurion fault I spent 2 hour on the phone no answer ,the following  day  when I got someone on the line .She was so rude ,and kept insisting  that  the phone was deliver .How will the phone be deliver if I am at a Verizon store trying to activate my old phone that is cracked. I lost client due to  this , I couldn't  reach out to  my kids all day  ,when they  got back to  me .I was told that I  need to  send some document to  have a new phone send . nobody  took the time to explain to me what happened , or to  apologies .it has Been 2 day no new phone ,no info  regarding  the phone that  was send .This company is a joke , please do not waist your money. don't purchase yourself a headache .  they don't even deserve 1 stars . Verizon just  lost  a valuable costumer ,and they  should refrain of using  this company

Review.Titre: Don't ask me to call you when the phone can't make a call.
Review.Contenu: Make the claim process easier.If the customers phone is broken and cannot complete a call, give other options like email or PC chat platform. Finding someone who will let you use their phone after your own just got broken is ridiculous. And why expect a customer to bother someone else to help resolve their problems when it's none of their business is just as ridiculous.

Review.Titre: Lies, false advertising, scam.
Review.Contenu: I've been told by Verizon store locations when my replacement comes it will be a new phone. Wrong. I have someone else's refurbished phone, can't hind that either because it's engraved into the back of my lavender s23 ultra as if it's a show mark.I pay over $300 monthly for just my phone alone, $20 monthly for insurance, $70 screen protector from Verizon, MY SCREEN PROTECTOR BROKE MY PHONE WHEN IT FELL. My "brand new" replacement is someone's refurbished phone. Waste of my money. Feels like a complete scam that I have to pay $300 plus for a phone that says refurbished and has a horrible gray line on the back.

Review.Titre: asurion is a waste of money and causes more stress than the original broken phone
Review.Contenu: while submitting a claim on a verizin phone. i've spent a week, consisting of hrs of phones calls and being on hold. always being told something different. just to be right back at the start with a broken phone and no real actions taken. employees talk over you. you cant explain to them what you need or that you know have located a store that can make repairs. i will never use them again.

Review.Titre: STAY AWAY FROM ASURION INSURANCE!!!!
Review.Contenu: Absolute worst customer service I've ever had. After paying insurance premiums to Asurion for many years through Verizon, I filed my FIRST claim - a replacement Apple watch - (the cheap one for $249). After 5 days of run-around, 12 hours on the phone, and 3 promises of overnight delivery along with bogus order numbers and tracking numbers, I gave up. I can't afford to waste any more time on the phone being lied to by placating "expert agents" whose job it is to B.S. me. STAY AWAY from this company!

Review.Titre: SCAM!
Review.Contenu: I wasn't informed by the rep selling the plan that they cover nothing for 30 days.  You pay the monthly fee and they give you nothing.  Very disappointed.  I was sold something that is completely useless to my family for 30 days.  Why would I pay for a service that doesn't cover what the service covers?

Review.Titre: Total Amazon rip-off
Review.Contenu: Total Amazon rip-off! They refuse to honor legit claims.Apparently people buying drones from Amazon are being misled by this company and AMAZON by allowing ASURION to sell fraudulent policies.

Review.Titre: Painful to deal with if you need to replace their replacement
Review.Contenu: Let me tell you what I have realized. If you waste your hard earned money and pay for the insurance, you get great service. My replacement phone came lightening quick and hassle free. That phone, however was a piece of refurbished garbage. I had canceled my insurance at that point and trying to get anyone to help me replace (because a 6 day old phone should be working ok) was one of the most trying, painful experiences ever. Your insurance gets you trash. So, never ever again. I'd rather smash my phone than have to deal with this painfully poorly organized company.

Review.Titre: Told my claim was on backorder
Review.Contenu: Told my claim was on backorder.  Which was fi e I had several follow up emails informing me it was still on back order.  Then the emails stopped and nothing for over 30 days.  I have tried calling bust customer service is non existent.  Terrible communication.  As many phones as we have available to us they did not try hard to resolve my broken phone. Pathetic. 👎

Review.Titre: Misleading contract go somewhere else
Review.Contenu: Website, explicitly states with a cover back glass for iPhone 13. However when I filed a claim for glass which would be zero dollars deductible, they insisted on replacing the phone I had a $99 deductible very misleading practices.Thanks for your reply but I stand by my review.  TrustPilot does not allow links in review if you google "asurion iphone back glass" you will see the misleading info first hand.

Review.Titre: Asurion tech came out and fixed my…
Review.Contenu: Asurion tech came out and fixed my broken iPhone screen. He was really fast and my iPhone screen looks new. After the tech left I received an email stating that my Verizon account was upgraded to a Home Protection Plan. I did not authorize this transaction and the tech basically “spiked” the feature upgrade on my account. I did not appreciate that.Reply to Asurion:Alexander Taylor816.364.9186Claim ID: 505671095419

Review.Titre: Not professional and reliable
Review.Contenu: Recently added to. File two claims for two of my employees phones. Both times that I file the claim the phones were out of stock. Had a way multiple days and had a quote twice. So they can resolve my issue with the auto stock phones... On one of the claims that I did I ask the tec person if they can help me activate my phoneShe said she couldn't help me with Delivering my phone.It was very aggravating unprofessional and not reliabl experience

Review.Titre: Terrible
Review.Contenu: Terrible, poor customer service. Appears to make thing difficult so the claim does not process. 3 weeks and 4 follow ups and still no reimbursement/ gift card.

Review.Titre: Waste of money
Review.Contenu: Purchased a mini split air conditioner on Amazon and purchased 24 month protection plan from Asurion. When I received the unit and had it installed, it did not work and was low on coolant. I filed a claim. They then decided that Asurion does not cover mini split air conditioners. They have offered a refund of the protection plan, but no refund for my $665 broken unit! How can they sell a protection plan and then decide they don't cover the item they sold the plan for?Sounds like a scam to me!

Review.Titre: Laptop broken at Asurion Store
Review.Contenu: I brought a laptop that was working to the asurion store and they claim that it was broken.  I took it home and it was indeed not working at all.  They denied any responsibility at the store.I have been getting emails from TrustPilot that they will be submitting a claim on my behalf, but I have yet to receive information confirming this.Well, Trustpilot was unable to submit a claim on my behalf, so the rating goes back down to1 star.

Review.Titre: Rude customer service
Review.Contenu: Thought I'd be able to use the Asurion near my home..that wasn't the case.  I was kind-of ok with that.  But I had the rudest tech person at The Heights location.  She wasn't personable-took my phone, asked for the pin and said it'll be ready in 2/3hrs.  Picked it up (the next day) she asked my name handed me the phone...thay was it.  No thank you, may I help with anything else-any other concerns.  Thank God my tech savvy teen helped me. Last experience at this location was MUCH better.

Review.Titre: Buyer Beware!
Review.Contenu: As I stated in my previous statement, Asurion should not mislead and misdirect their clients.  When I tried to file a claim on two different iPhones, each time I was directed to contact Apple because the phones were still under warranty.  WRONG!!!  Each phone’s warranty had expired in 2018!  Please stop misleading your clients and give better, trustworthy service when they need your help!

Review.Titre: Was charged a non return fee but phone…
Review.Contenu: Was charged a non return fee but phone was returned within the allowed time and I have the shipping receipt. I’ve reached out to you guy but no response and it seems like a very common problem

Review.Titre: I had a scheduled delivery between…
Review.Contenu: I had a scheduled delivery between 7-9pm. Took time off from work to be home in the window. Got notified at 9:30pm that they couldn’t complete the delivery. Ended up having to have the phone shipped to a vacation location which charged additional money to release the package at the hotel/casino. The package also did not have return phone label/packaging. In the past I’ve had good experiences, but this one cost a lot extra out of pocket, head ache, time trying to figure it all out and the Asurian agent was quite forward trying to upswell me some package I said no to countless times.

Review.Titre: Incorrect Warranty Information
Review.Contenu: I purchased a Washer in 2018 from JC Penny with an extended warranty through Asurion. I called Asurion on 11/20/23 to file a claim and, Jessica stated my warranty has expired. However, Samsung stated that my extended warranty was valid until 8/2024 (5 years after the manufacture warranty expired) Asurion's Website also states the time begins after the Manufacture Warranty expires. Samsung should consider using a different warranty company if Asurion is not going to stand by their products.

Review.Titre: Don’t waste your money on this fraudulent company
Review.Contenu: It’s been three weeks and three escalations of my claim without any additional notes or movement. Every time I call or reach out I get told it’ll be escalated and I will hear back in 48 hours. Nothing. This was a $900 water boost pump with $150 warranty.UPDATE. - although they responded to the review its still crickets on my claim. Don't waste your money - This was an expensive item with an expensive warranty.    This company needs to be audited by the government consumer protection department.

Review.Titre: They sent a refurbished device and now…
Review.Contenu: They sent a refurbished device and now the refurbished device is also defective. When contacting Samsung they asked for an IMEI # which shows the original purchase date of the refurbished phone and not the date that I received the phone as a replacement! Now i can't get anyone to take responsibility and replace yet again another defective phone.

Review.Titre: Total Frustration
Review.Contenu: Total FrustrationAfter filing a proper claim, I dropped off my IPAD to Asurion service provider U BREAK U FIX on July 20th, 2023. It is still not fixed or returned 32 days later (today) and no one can tell me when or if it will be fixed.  Long story but the Asurion customer service rep has not given us an update after several calls , he says he is working on it. The manager of U BREAK says he is waiting on someone from Asurion to solder the charging unit. He said they were coming out soon on several occasions, obviously he does not know. There has been no resolution of this issue,  No IPAD to use, No response from corporate office or U BREAK store. We have tried repeatedly to find out the status. I do not recommend this company.

Review.Titre: VERY slow service for repairs. Bad customer service.
Review.Contenu: Filed a claim and got it sent in around Sept 2.It is now the 16th and they are still waiting for some part. Also waiting for a second part implying they broke somethingEdit 9/21:Just got watch back finally and the IMEI is different indicating a new device. If not it was factory reset which is not required to replace a screen.Then customer service is doing nothing about this. Also kept the original packaging I sent it in with including the box it came in so I cant sell it in the future in its original packaging.Repair took so long I could have fixed it myself or taken it to my local backed up UBreakIFix to fix it.Lost my business.

Review.Titre: Office of the CEO very unprofessional.
Review.Contenu: Terms had changed since enrolling.  I was not adequately communicated to.  Getting ahold of a person was really hard for both AT&T and myself.  The frontline individuals were great. So were their managers.  At one point I talked to the office of the CEO.  They were quite unprofessional and even told me a customer... that they were going to discipline an employee for trying to help me make since of things. Nothing was done to help make things right. I have more details. However, I believe this is enough.  I plan on buying apple care on my next phones. Their overall customer experience is superior and over a hundred percent less expensive.

Review.Titre: Sub-par replacement!
Review.Contenu: My phone had a cracked screen. Asurion opted to send me a phone rather than fix mine - turned out to be a phone that is no longer manufactured and will soon not be supported. Had I known that I would have kept my phone with the cracked screen...it was a newer phone and much better than the refurbished, outdated phone I got from Asurion. I feel I've been had.

Review.Titre: My phone was delayed three times
Review.Contenu: My phone was delayed three different times with little to no communication. I paid almost $300 to get the run around and let them make a fool out of me. They associates are completely unreliable. They're are able to tell you they're coming and cancel last minute with no communication. The entire setup of the company is meant to force you to interact with no one and with the quality of their customer service it's better that way. I definitely won't be replacing a phone through them again.

Review.Titre: Unpleasant Experience
Review.Contenu: I felt extremely frustrated and upset when the technician accidentally damaged my Samsung Note 9. Prior to my visit to the Union City store, my phone was functioning flawlessly, albeit with a slightly diminished battery life. However, after their repair work, I was informed that they had replaced the battery, which subsequently led to issues with the motherboard. Upon retrieving my phone, I discovered that it was completely non-functional. Their recommendation was for me to send it to the Samsung Store in Palo Alto for further repair. Who's gonna pay for the repair?

Review.Titre: over 15 hours on the phone with Asurian and still didn't get the claim processed properly
Review.Contenu: i have had the absolute worse experience getting a claim processed.  I have spent over 15 hours on the phone with Asurian and ATT over the past 6 days.  Then when i did receive the replacement phone, it was programed for the wrong phone number on my account which led to another 2 hours on line with a tech (who was amazing, however unable to resolve the issue, so i am left with no phone service tonight)

Review.Titre: Your representatives are great but the…
Review.Contenu: Your representatives are great but the products your sending out need to be evaluated if you’re gonna refurbish them. I had to take time out of my day on two separate occasions to setup two bad phones you sent me and then take my time to ship them back to you. Then spend 2hrs on the phone to get reimbursement for the second one you sent me. Great workers but y’all gotta fix the products if you’re gonna send used phones out.

Review.Titre: I have been sent two different devices…
Review.Contenu: I have been sent two different devices to replace mine and the back of both phones are coming off and are swollen.I am a first responder!This is unexceptable!I have been a valued customer for over a decade!If this problem is not resolved I will have to go to a different carrier!I have been a loyal customer and the way I have been dealt with about my replacement device has caused me unnecessary stress and anxiety in my job.Please do better!

Review.Titre: The no show phone  They gave us a delivery date and told…
Review.Contenu: They gave us a delivery date and told us we had to be home when it arrived but didn't inform us it wasn't coming.  The next delivery date came and it didn't arrive again.  The third time it showed up finally.  Making numerous calls and sitting on hold not fun.

Review.Titre: Survey Quickly Covers Reference Number
Review.Contenu: After applying my information regarding my lost phone the window QUICKLY popped up of taking this STUPID survey. It COMPLETELY COVERED the Reference ID # AND THE ONLY OPTION IS TO TAKE A SURVEY. Now I cannot reach anyone and cannot access the ID#. Was there a test done in regards to the entire process w/ completing this survey? No reference number because I could not see it because the OPTION to take a survey is covering it.. NOT SMART AT ALL 😕

Review.Titre: Asurion has inaccurate coverage information even when I clearly see coverage in Verizon account
Review.Contenu: Asurion continued to tell me I have no coverage on a device that I do have coverage on. Continued to tell me device isn’t covered even though I pay for multi device coverage every month through Verizon. Tried filing for replacement through app, website and talking to representative 2 times. Both times I waited on hold for over 30 minutes to talk to asurion agent. The last call the agent was so uninterested in helping me, or listening to me minutes for the second time, he transferred me straight back to Verizon after I had just talked to them.

Review.Titre: Claim review process is unreasonably…
Review.Contenu: Claim review process is unreasonably stringent. Unless you're a professional photographer with editing/enhancing experience, photos may not be readable (Apple products with black backgrounds and black lettering) and will cause delays.  The process won't accept pictures of the same information provided via a photo of the packaging.  So, you will need to speak to a review agent before the claim can proceed with processing.

Review.Titre: Waste of Money / Scam
Review.Contenu: Asurion Home.  The one time I tried to submit a claim it was denied.  The person who sold me the subscription said it included the coverage of what happened to our TV. Turns out it didn't. It's a scam. The company relies on people not reading the 100 pages of terms. And the salespeople sell it differently.  DON'T BUY THIS!!!

Review.Titre: Thanks for a stressful week
Review.Contenu: You're site stated my phone would be delivered within 2 days of the order being placed.  That was not the case, it took 5 days for me to get my replacement phone back that I had to pay 300 dollars for.  Yes, an entire working week without my phone so thank you for showing me that I will be removing asurion protection from any and all of my devices in home or on my vehicle.  This was ridiculous and I know absolutely nothing will be done about it so I will handle it myself.

Review.Titre: Warranty Phone was trash
Review.Contenu: Warranty Phone was trash. Kept giving me error messages could not back up. Phone refused to upgrade had to return it back to the company was very disappointed.

Review.Titre: Fisrt time filing a claim
Review.Contenu: Started this claim on the 14th and still not finished. I'm fustrated and wouldn't Asurion service. I had to call three times to hear three different stories why I didn't receive my phone the next day. I'm waiting for the charger and block yo arrive now.

Review.Titre: If India answers …hang up and try again
Review.Contenu: I have spent more than 7 hours on the phone with your company since last Wednesday.  All I have been given is erroneous information and I have been transferred from department to department to no avail.  All over an iPad 4 mini that needs to be replaced Still not able to fully access the replacement screen. A full week of wasted time.  From the 9th through the 16th and counting

Review.Titre: I had the worst time getting my cell…
Review.Contenu: I had the worst time getting my cell replacement. First they sent a Samsung when it was an iPhone then I just kept getting email to call back for almost two weeks and finally just now I got my replacement and it was a pro instead of a pro max but whatever almost a month later I get what I can take

Review.Titre: Horrible
Review.Contenu: Horrible! it took me all day to make a claim. Verizon just lost a good customer

Review.Titre: Asurion is garbage
Review.Contenu: Asurion is garbage. Tried filing multiple claims and their website always states "Unfortunately, we are unable to complete your claim on the web at this time." I had a product insured from an Amazon purchase, and couldn't get a claim filed so I had to just return through Amazon's return policy. Then on a separate occasion, we had Asurion as the protection plan through our mobile carrier. Of course something happened to a phone and I went to the site to file a claim. At first, they tried to tell me I wasn't covered. Then finally when I got then to fix my account, I went through the claim process, and still got the same message, "Unfortunately, we are unable to complete your claim on the web at this time." Come to find out, even the sales rep says he always has to call the phone number because their website never works. Now I discover that there is a deductible, and that it's almost as much as I paid for the device.I've spent MONTHS trying to get this resolved. The *only* thing even worth ONE star is that the actual repair techs are pretty helpful -- but that's because they are Asurion employees, they work for companies that Asurion contracts through -- Asurion doesn't actually do anything themselves. I hope the company goes bankrupt.

Review.Titre: Disgusting scammers
Review.Contenu: Disgusting scammers. Pocketed my Z Fold 5 and said I haven't delivered it over a week later. Impossible to contact. I will be filing a charge back for the whole item if they change me a late fee. Will also boycott Samsung for partnering with them. Update to this review: no one ever replied to my email from the address they gave in this reply. Pure bad faith lip service. Avoid Asurion at all costs.

Review.Titre: The rep was having issues with asking…
Review.Contenu: The rep was having issues with asking me what she needed. Several times she needed a number but got it wrong when I repeated it back 3 times. She also kept telling me she needed the imei but realized it wasn't the number she needed all along and I think it messed up my Sim card after bc we couldn't get my Sim to work and had to do esim instead. Was on for 1hr and 30min to get it to work.

Review.Titre: Asurion repair person no show!
Review.Contenu: Asurion repair person was a no show. No call to reschedule, no I'm running late. Just a no show.I was on the phone for over an hour trying to get information on when I could get another appointment scheduled.  I was placed a week out.

Review.Titre: Worst customer service ever
Review.Contenu: Worst customer service ever. Spent 5 hours on phone just to file claim. Couldn’t determine if find my phone was removed from phone and would t let claim go through. Then bypassed that requirement but by then too late for next day delivery. Then after they said replacement on the way  I get an email that said phone was back ordered. Now website not working to track status of claim. Miserable experience. Then I read reviews online about all the problems with the refurbished phones they send. I have not talked to anyone with a good experience. The majority of the reviews of asurion on this site must be fake!

Review.Titre: Terrible experience
Review.Contenu: Asurion was supposed to deliver my phone on Friday evening between 5-7pm. They called at 6:45pm to say that they could not deliver it that evening. They offered to ship it FedEx for delivery the next day. Another lie. I called Saturday night to try to find my phone. It had not been shipped. On MondayI finally got a tracking number. It is supposed to be delivered on Tuesday - FIVE DAYS after filing the claim RIDICULOUS!! Oh, the did offer a $25 gift card which was INSULTING- my time I've spent trying to get a replacement phone would come to about 10 cents per hour. I am can can canceling this terrible service the minute I get my replacement phone. I'd give Asurion a ZERO if it let me. Oh and I have to pay a $275 deductible. OUTRAGEOUS!!!

Review.Titre: I have not had a phone in over two weeks!
Review.Contenu: I have been waiting over two weeks without a working phone and my claims keep getting denied, even after the representative did the third claim for me and everything! This is ridiculous. They claim they respond to claims in 24 hours, I put a 4th claim in last Friday and today is Tuesday night and still no word from them. Horrible service.

Review.Titre: Second time i've tried to get a…
Review.Contenu: Second time i've tried to get a replacement for my Apple Watch. No delivery yet. First time was back in May. This is AUGUST.  I'm pretty disgusted. Verizon rep assures me that I will pay less and get better quality service when I switch from ATT. I'm ready except i already paid my $100 for this replacement.

Review.Titre: Beware
Review.Contenu: Would not recommend. I got the run around, multiple cancelings, and a tech who made up excuses to not show up.It's obvious this is a typical insurance tactic. Take our money but refuse to pay up when the service we pay for is needed.

Review.Titre: Painful ordeal to say the least
Review.Contenu: I can't express how painful it has been to deal with this company. I have an S21 through Virgin, that was 2 years old. It stopped charging properly and Asurion (who deals with Virgin Smart Care) replaced my phone with what was supposed to be a new or refurbished phone. My replacement phone is not working properly at all, not even two weeks old and I need it for work. Long story short, Hours and hours of trying to get someone to take responsibility for this new phone is a nightmare. Asurion sends me to Virgin to get a tech ID# before they will start a claim. Virgin sends me to a store an hour away. The store doesn't have a tech team so Asurion sends me back to Virgin. Virgin then tells me that the drive wasn't necessary and that the tech team can troubleshoot remotely and then give me a tech ID#. If I had known that getting a replacement phone was going to be this painful I would have just bought a new phone as my original was paid off.

Review.Titre: Filed a claim and got shipped two replacements phones, neither worked.
Review.Contenu: We have a broken iphone. In the 10 days we have received not one but two replacement phones from Asurion and neither of them worked. So, we shipped back both phones and are waiting to get the third replacement phone. I have spent hours on the phone with Asurion and ATT to resolve this situation and we are still without a replacement phone.

Review.Titre: The JBLM store is horrible!
Review.Contenu: The JBLM store is horrible! If you walk in as the website suggests, you run the risk of the store not being open, even though the sign shows the hours that the store is supposed to be open.  However, I made an appointment, even received an email the morning of the appointment to confirm my appointment but when I went to the store, the woman said working in the store said they were closed.  This is not the first time I've gone to the store and they were not open or available to provide service.  They wasted my time with no prior notice of not being open today.  I will not recommend or patronize this location again.

Review.Titre: I filed my claim and received a damaged…
Review.Contenu: I filed my claim and received a damaged replacement phone twice. Then you guys held up completing my claim because you wanted me to send the damaged replacement phones back to you before I could finish the claim and receive a working undamaged phone, which I still have not received to this day 8/10/23.

Review.Titre: Nightmare of frustration
Review.Contenu: Dealing with was one of the worst experiences I have had with a customer service department. You were inefficient, ineffective And incompetent. One of the people I spoke to was having a party in the background. You should actually call me at 407.782.8385. And I will give you the details if you even give a damn.

Review.Titre: The replacement phone that was sent is…
Review.Contenu: The replacement phone that was sent is malfunctioning and turning itself off.  Some apps dont work correctly.  Bad timing considering its my daughter’s phone and is about to go into labor.

Review.Titre: I wouldn’t even give you a rating of a…
Review.Contenu: I wouldn’t even give you a rating of a 1!  This was the worst and most hastle my daughter has ever had to go through to replace a phone! Uploading documents 5 times along with photo ids multiple times.calling only to get told the same thing by one rep that she had just heard from another! We will definitely be looking to change phone carriers and be sure they don’t use you for insurance! Not to forget to mention the phone is fully insured but we have to pay for a new one! Double dipping!

Review.Titre: apple watch repaired
Review.Contenu: I needed my apple watch repaired  and the person I was chatting with made me  an appointment just to find out that they do not repair apple watches. Why am I paying for insurance on me device if they are not going to repair my watch.

Review.Titre: Reversed Insurance Fraud by a company…
Review.Contenu: Reversed Insurance Fraud by a company insuring one's tech devices and cell phones that warns one of their probable insurance filing claim frauds so as to scare one that is trying to make a rightious.legal claim. They make one sure that one is never to try to over claim on loses.Then they begin their demanding constant recycling of the claim form process till one is so frustrated and confused that one becomes fearful of being charged with fraudulant claim filing.First one fills out a rather simple claim form pertaining to their loss, a non-functioning device. Next step is they ask for a photo to identify the item. Take a picture of all identifying serial and model numbers. In my case there were three non-functioning security cameras. I newly acquired VZ modem made connecting them to the WiFi impossible. Two were submitted. A while latee the third one was submitted. Meanwhile denials and requests for more proofs were stated to be required. The third claim went out. The redone claims with new pics went out. Denials came in requiring a third redo of the claim filing. Then the third claim got denied. More requests bombarded me. Now totally confused. I refused to go forward. I began to feel that I was being drawn into double claiming and being guilty of fraud. There was no going back nor forward. Text messages kept coming. Confusion mounted. Frustration mounted. I was willing to just send all three non-functioning cams in to Asurion. Pics were not serving anyone well. All claims were being continually denied. The process was a broken merry-go-round. Be aware that the pictures submitted were wonderfully close-up and clear. The back of each cam had its name and a bold black numeral and letter sequence. That is all that there was.Do not pay Verizon or any company for any Asurion insurance product plan.11/07/23 The company's response was to whitewash the negative review. There has been no caring contact nor action taken by non-caring tech device insurance company, Asurion.

Review.Titre: Go to Verizon Store instead.
Review.Contenu: I used the toll free number to set-up my phone for ease and expert help. It was neither easy nor was the person an expert on phone set-up. I ended up going to the local Verizon store for help, they were much more knowledgeable.

Review.Titre: I bought a brand new phone and insured…
Review.Contenu: I bought a brand new phone and insured it. When it’s damaged, a used refurbished phone is sent to replace it. Then I receive a series of harassing messages about returning the damaged phone in less 48 hours as if people don’t have to work.

Review.Titre: I was not helped nor heard
Review.Contenu: I was not helped nor heard, I hate that I am being charged every month for something I can’t use. Management won’t take my call nor call me back and it is frustrating that the call agents don’t even care. Gave me the run around steadily transferring me back to the automated phone call. I am very disappointed.

Review.Titre: Asurion is obviously not worth it…
Review.Contenu: Asurion is obviously not worth it anymore, pro on the go never showed up, when I called asurion I was o my able to get Verizon reps who were very helpful. Will be cancelling asurion tonight.

Review.Titre: Could not understand the representative…
Review.Contenu: Could not understand the representative and she could not understand me! They already send me a faulty phone now 2nd replacement having issues what is going on!! I pay $17 a month for garbage to Asurion!

Review.Titre: Unacceptable
Review.Contenu: To communicate with an actual person chatting, were very simple, but it's been over a year an resolve my repairs/issues with the 2 products hasn't been resolved as of yet, from year 22'-23'.✨ I'm beyond very disappointed.

Review.Titre: This is the second phone Asurion has…
Review.Contenu: This is the second phone Asurion has had to replace for me in less than a year.  AND YES, The Dog REALLY did try to eat my phone!  NO hassel replacement, and Im so relieved to know I had INSURANCE !!

Review.Titre: I received the new iPad and when I was…
Review.Contenu: I received the new iPad and when I was trying to setup the iPad didn’t even power up. I placed it on the charger and it did nothing. This device was DOA and had to order another one. Waited another couple of days just get the replacement for the replacement. This was the worse experience I have ever had.

Review.Titre: This service seems good in theory
Review.Contenu: This service seems good in theory, but not only are they slow, but they’re inconvenient. They also send dead links in e.mails for you to check on your claim and parts that have to be ordered — something as simple as a screen — add another 3-5 days to the 3-5 days of the repair. My experience was that the place — which was out of the way — where I took to have my laptop serviced shipped my laptop to another place. So I have no clue where it is now. First claim after a few years, and this was more of a headache than it was worth. AFTER paying a $108 deductible.

Review.Titre: There is a better way of doing business
Review.Contenu: 1)Consider full history of enrollment when choosing to not cover a device. (Last experience - PC HP laptop.)2)Tell customer upfront that replacement device being provided is a refurbished device.  (Recent Previous experience -Samsungzfold3.)3) when not returning device with issue resulting from manufacturer, provide comparable refund for replacement, not 40% and you keep the device. (3rd most recent previous experience - Samsungsmartwatch.)

Review.Titre: Asurian horrible experience
Review.Contenu: My iPhone XS Max went dead. Made a claim. For $250 copay I was given a refurbished replacement of same phone. I was never told to return the phone. I started getting multiple text messages to erase personal info and return the phone or I would be charged a $215 penalty. I spoke with Dex on 7/24 who told me no need to send the broken phone back since it was already paid in full.  For the next week got several more texts to erase the phone data and return it or I would be assessed the penalty.  I can’t turn on my old phone so how can I delete my personal information? Every time I call ATT I’m on hold 30 minutes.  I am very irritated with this experience. Spoke with Daphanie today which took an hour. No resolve, she said she was sending another return label.  NEVER GOT IT!!!!   I’ve been with ATT for 30 years.  Now I’m thinking about switching because of this experience    Very disappointed.

Review.Titre: Very unsatisfying customer service
Review.Contenu: Very unsatisfying customer service. Lost my phone July 29th and was not given phone until august 4th due to claims not being submitted fully after I called and many problems such as a claim denial saying that my phone was still being used

Review.Titre: New phone sent was defective
Review.Contenu: New phone sent was defective. The back cover to both phones sent to me were both separated from the phone main body. Just very unprofessional on Phone Quality Control.

Review.Titre: My personal experience
Review.Contenu: My personal experience, my claim was denied twice, I was told product is covered. Small mistake made initial application. I been trying to correct the problem for a week now. Too many departments involved in filing a claim and they don't communicate with each other.

Review.Titre: Mediocre customer service
Review.Contenu: Dropped our call numerous times during the claim process. Had to start over each time as we got several different people each call… even with the claim#. Felt that they were trying to stall to the point we would give up. Ultimately after several DAYS, they replaced our stolen phone. Typical insurance behavior… take your money quick then make you work for the claim.

Review.Titre: 4-year plan on a Macbook
Review.Contenu: Purchased a 4-year coverage on a macbook for my daughter as she headed off to college. She ended up getting liquid damage to her laptop. There is an apple certified repair place on campus which could fix it for her in 2 days, but Asurion wants her to wait to receive a shipping box (up to 5 business days) to then ship the laptop to them, and then wait to receive the repaired laptop.  She needs the laptop everyday for school work and it would've been a lot easier if Asurion could work with us to minimize the down-time.It appears impossible to get a live person at Asurion and the chat agent told me the only way to use the coverage was to send it to them.  At least they're not flat out denying the coverage, which is why this is a 2-starrer.

Review.Titre: I think Asurion needs better…
Review.Contenu: I think Asurion needs better troubleshooting options. Once every 3rd qtr they should go over ALL their online/phone to verify that things are functioning well. I tried using the Online portion "Phoneclaim.com", kept trying to send code to the phone I was filing claim to replace-won't power on!!!! and kept trying to verifying me over/over. The phone number use to call Asurion is just a recording with only 3 options for support, than hangs up.

Review.Titre: Fixed my phone screen but took 7 hours
Review.Contenu: Fixed my phone screen but took 7 hours, there are few locations near by so I drove an hour to the store, had to drive back home and then do it again later in the day again. After I asked if I could hang around and pick up sooner, it wasn't even an option. Then they had the audacity to call a few days later for me to bring it back to complete a test they missed when they had my phone for 7 hours to do a simple screen fix.

Review.Titre: Reps lied to me
Review.Contenu: Usually have a positive experience with this place but it was different this time. I had 2 reps tell me I was going to be a new fold 5 as a replacement phone. One rep is the one who shipped it out, told me I was getting a brand new phone. So I went out and bought a case for the fold 5 as to protect it as soon as I got it. Unfortunately that was a waste of time as I got the phone today and it's a refurbished fold 3. To top it off it didn't come with any of the screen protectors it Usually would come with so I can't even use it until that comes in the mail. Very dissatisfied with the entire experience.

Review.Titre: It has taken 3+ weeks to file a claim…
Review.Contenu: It has taken 3+ weeks to file a claim (3-4 NEW attempts), and “tech experts” could not problem solve my issue in any way… so everytime i would get transferred 2-4 times it then was escalated to management, also several times because we had zero direction in resolving issues with downloading pictures, among many other issues.  Supervisor was amazing and finally expressed how to resolve the simple issue then we got transferred 4 more times... only for a member to say we NEED to ups our laptop when the store is 10 minutes from our house. That escalated to another person who fixes the application issue and I get confirmation email saying i dont need to ship and can go to nearby store.  i get there and they have no record of my case number, the email from customer service stating i can bring it in did not matter to anyone… called in again and an hour of being on hold, while in the store no less… totallying 4hrs today… supervisor fixes the issue (previous person didnt actually finalize the option for drop off in store) and continued until that was finally resolved an hour+ later.  I could not count how many emails were shared, calls made, claims attempted, and hours on hold.  All i need is a human to look at my laptop.  This company is a joke, DO NOT waste your money.  Majority of employees do NOT have problem solving skills, zero patience with people who do not understand technology, and zero listening skills. Be ready to repeat your issue and repeat your identity and new confirmation codes every time your transferred to a new person and stay on hold for 4+ hours each time.  And be prepared for each employee to not know what to do.  Sylvia and Linda (supervisors)… you are amazing and the only ones knowing how to do your job... if it wasn't for people like you I would have never been able to get a claim pushed through or to the store, or the company would be gone by now. You both deserve better… or at minimal a raise, promotion or huge bonus.

Review.Titre: Customers' should be treated with respect.
Review.Contenu: Your rep John treated me as if I were trying to commit FRAUD. In my whole life, 73yrs I have never lied or try to swindle anyone. I have never been so injured by his accusation. The young lady who handled after repaired your reputation and my keeping your company

Review.Titre: Took 2 hours to activate my phone
Review.Contenu: Took 2 hours to activate my phone. Lost contact with rep and had to call back . Lost several items not transferred........there response was cold and  generic and as meaningless as their fake sincerity....

Review.Titre: Racket - Fraud
Review.Contenu: Frustrated that I pay a monthly fee of $50 for years for protection only to have to pay an additional $187 to replace a stolen device. I could have bought a new watch multiple times by saving the $ from not purchasing insurance. Racket

Review.Titre: Glad my issue was resolved
Review.Contenu: Glad my issue was resolved. However, the expert was annoying and too pushy in trying to get me to sign up for another service. I told him I wasn't interested twice and he proceeded to ask me why and push his service on me. Finally, I ended up just hanging up on him.

Review.Titre: Where's my watch…
Review.Contenu: I was told by the representative that my watch was delivered August 15th...I found an email dated Aug 21st showing that Asurion technician received my watch. I either want it repaired, replaced with same style, i.e. not Bluetooth but cellular, or a refund.

Review.Titre: Asurion tech could not resolve Esim issue
Review.Contenu: I filed the claim and received my replacement device promptly, however, after transferring all my information to the new device, my phone service would not transfer. It seems the e-sim assigned to my phone would not accept my serve. The Asurion tech could not resolve the issue so we had to enlist AT&T’s tech assistance. I had Asurion protection for at least 5 years without a claim so I am extremely disappointed. $9 a month for at least 60 months, not exactly cost effective .

Review.Titre: Aggravation
Review.Contenu: Unfortunately the replacement phones are refurbished so once they open the phone to fix it, it loses its water resistance rating. So if it’s in a sweaty pocket or gets splashed the phones as good as gone. Then getting ahold of a real person to find out where the new phone is, is a joke of a process. On the bright side The person Chanel was great and actually pointed me in the right direction. Currently sitting on hold 15mins and counting.

Review.Titre: A fast or quick response time
Review.Contenu: My fault, I had a short time to message your CSR, I had a phone number that was technical support but that agent transferred me to correct department. Once three I had to wait for a CSR to start the chat but by the time they initiated the chat I had to get ready to leave for a doctors appointment. I figured I had enough time to chat with the right agent but by the time he or she initiated the conversation I had to leave to go to my doctors appointment. It wasn’t her fault because I picked the wrong time to have a proper conversation.

Review.Titre: Service is Mediocre
Review.Contenu: The time frame to get an appointment is decent if you get your claim approved! You have to make sure you call Asurion if you have any issues trying to get your device repaired or replaced. A fair warning is that if the device on your claim was not in use on the enrolled wireless number when the issue occurred then they will deny your claim. How can a client get their phone repaired or replaced if they never used that mobile number to begin with? Other than that, the expert was friendly and repaired my device in her vehicle within less than 30 minutes!

Review.Titre: Defective refurbished phones.
Review.Contenu: The phone that is in the process of being replaced belongs to the mother, Selena Schniederjan, on Tammy Onufreiczuk’s plan. The phone was sent in because it had a bad battery & other problems. So far 2 defective phones have been sent, waiting currently for a third to be delivered. Customer service has been great, we keep getting bad refurbished phones.

Review.Titre: Bad customer experience and tedious process
Review.Contenu: Had to call a total of six times to get the claim processed, jumping through multiple hoops and had to provide identity paperwork and sign an affidavit - on top of paying a very high deductible. Not to mention a huge fee if I didn't return the damaged phone. I am not impressed by this insurance, the savings are minimal and not worth the hassle in my opinion.

Review.Titre: Had several app problems with my…
Review.Contenu: Had several app problems with my replacement IPhone since receiving it. I did most of the set-up myself but two apps didn’t appear in the new phone. CVS pharmacy wouldn’t allow me to reset my password, and I really tried for a week, with the assistance of two technicians. The other medical app didn’t think I knew my mother’s maiden name. I’m still stopped there. Late today the CVS app seems to be working. But I’m not going to hold my breath…

Review.Titre: Good experience turned bad
Review.Contenu: I had an Epson printer that malfunctioned and Asurion quickly and efficiently arranged for me to get a replacement with a gift card (credit certificate, not sure what it was called)  I got the new printer on sale and had a balance left on the card.  A few months later I went to use it but could find no information in my email about it.   have called Asurion 4 times about this matter.  The first 3 times I was told that I would receive information about the balance on my account within 24 hours.  It never came.  Today I made call number 4.  Daniel told me you have to spend the credit all at once, it's a "one time deal"  I was unaware of this.  While waiting on hold for Daniel to look into this I was disconnected.  I don't have the time or energy to pursue this further but I am disappointed that what started out as a good experience had ended badly

Review.Titre: Held hostage during a hard sales pitch on another warranty service
Review.Contenu: Instructions to activate a replacement iPhone were incomplete. Called the number to activate the phone and the menu options were a joke. It took me 3 attempts to finally get to a support person. I actually spent more time on the phone getting a hard sales pitch for a warranty on other WiFi connected devices than the time it took to get the phone activated. No matter how many times I said I did not want the WiFi device warranty, the support person kept trying to sell me the warranty. Even after I told the guy to move on he still tried one more time. I felt like I was being held hostage. Very disappointed with the Asurion experience.

Review.Titre: Asurion store lost misplaced my SIM…
Review.Contenu: Asurion store lost misplaced my SIM tray and in turn had me wait three days when the cracked screen repaire should of only took a couple of hours max. And I asked for my phone he said the auto focus camera malfunctioning on the tests but was told it was replaced. And should work fine to only go outside.... thinking it was fixed. And go outside and see a fingerprint smudge. Quickly walked inside. Showed employee my issue. He Quickly agreed and told me it'll take minutes to clean.  And I don't understand how something foreseeable like getting told by the testing machine that auto focus is out of wack and not even noticing the smudge or bothered to check if that it may be a reason to check camera lens. Worst experience and  my suggestion is not to leave stores in hands of teenagers and leave them to be monitored by adults. The experience I had were rookie mistakes all the way through and don't feel okay after waiting three days and paying for that experience

Review.Titre: It took several days to complete info…
Review.Contenu: It took several days to complete info transfer, had to have two replacement phones sent. Finally I was sent to Lawrenceburg Indiana AT&T store. The manager spent a day and a half before getting everything corrected. She also removed all data on both phones so I could return per instructions. Not an easy experience.

Review.Titre: claim difficult to get approved...bad experience
Review.Contenu: claim was extremely difficult to get approved. submitted at least 5 times...took almost a mopnth with back and forths....everytime Asurion came back with a different minor detail missing... no clear instructions.

Review.Titre: If possible call the repair store of choice to confirm part(s) availability
Review.Contenu: Repair store chosen for a simple cracked screen replacement didn't have the replacement screen in stock. I was then sent to another store, 5 miles away from the first store. On arrival to the second store, I was informed I would need to request a change in switching from the first store before they could repair the cell phone. I went online after calling Verizon for info as to how to access the store change page. I was successful in changing the store and the repair was finally made.

Review.Titre: Mysterious delays happening with my simple claim
Review.Contenu: Great chat customer service.  I'm concerned about my claim being delayed because the "service advisor" (level 2 support?) had to locate a broker who will accept my broken electronic MP3 player (dropped it on the floor, it stopped working).  Could be 3 days, maybe even longer? Can't access my claim status online until this is settled. I'm required to wait for a phone call from the "advisor". So I'm helpless, running blind. The whole process is definitely not transparent, and definitely affecting my claim experience negatively.  I'm not happy about that at all!

Review.Titre: Poor communication and empty promises
Review.Contenu: My product was not available. I was offered alternative options. The one I chose was in back order. After about 7 seven days, I received an email asking me to call Asurion. When I called Asurion, I told my story to 2 different associates. The second associate offered me a solution, promised me to next day deliver my product, and for all the inconveniences, he was going to waive my deductible.I received my product as promised. However, I was charged the deductible. I called Asurion to asked about what had happened. I was told by another associate (third associate) that he was going to care of the issue. I have not heard about any solutions regarding the deductible fee that was charged.The communication with Asurion up to this point has been poor.

Review.Titre: Did not have a screen in stock
Review.Contenu: Did not have a screen in stock for my phone unless I wanted to drive 2 hours on a weekend day off and wait 4 hours to get fixed because stores with parts only send to stores in their area. Long story short I paid $250 for a new phone instead of the $29 dollar screen I needed to replace if they had the parts in my area. I was willing to drive from auburn to elk grove but not 2 hours away when I pay for insurance, they should have replaced my phone for the $29 since it's their fault they don't have the parts in a reasonable location. Will be switching at&t and insurance once this phone is paid off.

Review.Titre: If your company makes an error, FIX IT ASAP
Review.Contenu: My grandsons tablet stopped charging.  I submitted a claim, took a few days to get to me, when I did receive a replacement device, it was defective. I found this out after 3 phone calls and telling my story 3 different times. The replacement tablet was still programed to a company and would not allow me to activate. I call to advise Asurion, they submit another Claim and it went into a review status, so there goes another 3 days. I had to call and push the claim through AFTER your error and than a ridiculous review on a claim that was your error. Finally spoke with someone,  I will get the tablet the next day before noon..Nope, did not receive it until late afternoon 2 days later.. I paid my $99 fee on top of the monthly fee to have this service and this is what I get?? I am not a happy customer at all. 2 plus weeks to get a replacement... That is not acceptable at all..

Review.Titre: Extra fee on top of coverage fee. Website was easy to use.
Review.Contenu: I paid for the extra coverage buying the phone new through Telus.2 years later the screen cracked and need to use the service I've already paid for. The website was easy.  But the closest location was an hour drive away when there's a number of locations local to me.I already paid for the coverage and filing the claim required another $40.  Slimy business.TLDR: Require to drive an hour away instead of going to a local shop.  Extra charge on top of the coverage fee already paid for.  Slimy business.

Review.Titre: Asuncion takes a fee although you have device care
Review.Contenu: I pay for device care every month to Telus then Asurion wants another $250 to replace my phone that I already have insurance for.  Wrong color, phone runs hot, tech on phone was not knowledgeable. Something wrong with screen and screen protector will not adhere. Glad I have device care or would have no phone but asurion is the lesser of 2 evils.

Review.Titre: The phone you sent is worthless
Review.Contenu: The phone you sent is worthless! I understand it’s a fixer upper but when I pay insurance faithfully for years I should have received a better phone. And to recive threatened text the next day I received your phone is really unfair to customers and especially this veteran

Review.Titre: Almost from the beginning and about 20…
Review.Contenu: Almost from the beginning and about 20 times throughout the interaction, he kept trying to sign me up for your home protection plan.  All I wanted to do was set up my phone, but he wanted to sell me the protection plan.  As for setting up the phone, he said all I needed to do was put in my Google account, and it would all be taken care of, and then he tried to sell me the plan.  Well, that didn't work; I had to go back to the Smartswitch app on my own to get everything to transfer.

Review.Titre: This whole process is outdated and…
Review.Contenu: This whole process is outdated and redundant.  From beginning to end I have experienced both technical and support problems.  I enter the claim process through the Amazon and I have to go back and search all pertinent purchase info to begin, which makes no sense when all of that information is in my product plan file. If I can open the file and see it why can't Asurion expert?  Something Asurion and Amazon need to work on.  I have 12 protected products in my file and I dread ever having to file another claim. On top of that I must have attempted to get through the process a least 5 times and each time got stuck or redirected and had to chat or call and repeat the same information.

Review.Titre: It Shouldn’t be this Hard!
Review.Contenu: The problem began when our first agent put in the address incorrectly for our replacement delivery. The unit number was missing a zero, so FedEx would not release the package and took it back to their dispach center. But we couldn’t pick it up because Asurion needed to call them to say it was ok. It took 4 days, 4 calls, and 4 hours of being on hold with various helpful and rude folks to get through to someone that could finally help. Super frustrating and unnecessary experience. Perfect example of a company that is too big to properly care for its customers.

Review.Titre: The chat contact did an excellent job…
Review.Contenu: The chat contact did an excellent job and I provided the requested information about the product.  She was able to verify everything.  She even filed the claim for me and said I would get an e-mail.  Well, the email was about me providing all the information again and this time with photos of the receipts which she has obviously already verified.  I am not tech savvy and now have to get someone to help.  Seems a bit convoluted and redundant.

Review.Titre: Two BAD Experiences
Review.Contenu: I've had two experiences. Both by far not good.  Eperience one: I had my phone and tablet stolen. Asurion was able to send me a tabet but not the phone. So I had to accept the cash value for it, which to their credit, was generous. HOWEVER, once they send me the funds through a third party, I NEVER received the funds.  I've already made 5 phone calls and still no funds. Second Experience: I cracked the creen on my phone Galaxy S22 Ultra. NONE of their stores withing one hour drive had the parts available unless I waited several days and the availability was not guaranteed (I actually had an appointment where they called and canceled due lack of parts). At the end, I had to wait with a cracked screen, which affected by business greatly. They get two stars because the one tabled did arrive on time.

Review.Titre: Be more professional and use clear…
Review.Contenu: Be more professional and use clear devices that have complete and clear imei numbers, looking nice and working that is not mean device is clearDEVICES YOU ARE SENDING, THAT BASICLY BELONGS TO US, BECAUSE IT IS BEEN PAID OFF IS BEING IMPOSSIBLE TO UNLOCK, BECAUSE HAVING ALWAYS IMEI ISSUES, AND FIXING THAT ISSUE TAKES HOURS AND HOURS BUT STILL NEVER GETTING FIXED, THE CALLS ARE BEING BOUNSED FROM ATT TO YOU THAN TO ATT THAN TO YOU THAN TO SAMSUNG. AND IMEI ARE NOT GETTING UPDATED IN YOUR SYSTEM. STAFF GETTING CONFUSED WHEN YOU GET MORE THAN, ONE CLAIM. AND SO ON. YOU NEED MORE CARING STUFFF INSTEAD OF CARELESS PEOPLE WHO IS MAKING THEIR HOURS FOR SALARY BUT NOT FOR PROFESSIONAL SERVICE

Review.Titre: Brace yourself for long waits and the…
Review.Contenu: Brace yourself for long waits and the most annoying announcements to go to their website to get the issue resolved, get that darn pin and then the techs try to sell you a $25.00 warranty for all devices. All I want is for my issue to be resolved and not have to be constantly saying NO, NO, NO to their offer. I got this one tech who must have been in India or Pakistan and there was laughing and partying in the background, then I got disconnected. It takes a big chunk of your day to get an appointment.

Review.Titre: Not only was phone not delivered as…
Review.Contenu: Not only was phone not delivered as promised, we never received communication letting us know that the tech would not be coming that day, so we wasted a Saturday waiting for someone when they apparently knew early in the day that it would’nt happen due to “van issues.” I was told to call back first thing Sunday morning for same day service and an appt. was scheduled. I had to press hard for the rep to contact the service center to see if the van issues had been resolved. After a lengthy wait, I learned that the van was still inoperable and wouldn’t be coming. If I hadn’t pressed for answers, yet another day would’ve been wasted. Terrible cs on the technician end.

Review.Titre: It took me nearly 48 hours to get…
Review.Contenu: It took me nearly 48 hours to get approval for a screen replacement because your system logged it as a phone replacement. I didn't even know it until my claim was finally approved and it was for a phone replacement not a screen.

Review.Titre: The guy I talked to over the phone…
Review.Contenu: The guy I talked to over the phone accent was so heavy that it was hard to understand him. He also was trying to hint I feel like that I was lying about what was wrong with my phone. Then the delivery guy waited til the last min to deliver the replacement phone like if it wasn’t 9 o’clock

Review.Titre: The Asurion person spelled my last name…
Review.Contenu: The Asurion person spelled my last name wrong and seemed to barely understand English. The ATT rep messed up trying to connect my phone and I lost service until the following day. Since my phone was cut off, She was not able to calll me back or did not try to call me on the wireless number. I called the tech people at Att and they did nothing and I had to go to the ATT store to get everything connected. (t was a nightmare.

Review.Titre: It took a little over a month for you…
Review.Contenu: It took a little over a month for you to replace the phone because you had computer glitches and my case fell through the cracks.  Note that I would send "review my case" messages frequently.  I had to talk to two computers and several persons before I was able to find the person to help me find and resolve my case.

Review.Titre: this company wants you to do so much…edit, case closed
Review.Contenu: this company wants you to do so much work, just to get them to repair replace items you have paid them to have insurance for! today i asked them to refund both so called warranty services!.....edit, its ok i have gotten my money back for both warranty's . but thanks for responding.

Review.Titre: I first described my experience and the…
Review.Contenu: I first described my experience and the response was given that someone would be in touch to chat with me when someone was available. Immediately after that I got a request to complete a survey about the service which I haven’t. I haven’t had yet, so I’m really confused as to what I’m supposed to do to get help even though everyone tells me this is a wonderful application and works really well. Can you help

Review.Titre: Not a convenience
Review.Contenu: I had to verify shipping address on the phone. First delivery couldn't be made as promised, then I had to call in order to start a new claim. When I received refurbished phone replacement the sim card didn't work, I had to go to phone store anyway. Not at all a convenience, I live over an hour from nearest at&t store.

Review.Titre: I'm sure if your product is actually…
Review.Contenu: I'm sure if your product is actually covered by the play you purchase their fine but I wouldn't know. Amazon offered a 2 year "ride on" protection plan in addition to the $2500 ride on item we bought. We purchased the protection plan since it was a high dollar item. The item arrived unusable. Apon filing my claim I was informed that my item in fact WAS NOT covered by the "ride on" plan.

Review.Titre: I got transfered back and forth several…
Review.Contenu: I got transfered back and forth several times just to request a new shipping label... every single transfer led to me being forced fed another insurance service for electronics I don't even own... it's very annoying. I'm paying to ensure my phone... not to be force-fed new products or services to purchase. It's very frustrating. If it happens again I'm going to file a corporate, BBB AND FTC complaint. If I'm interested in your products... I WILL ASK... and to make 3 mistakes.... make me be on the phone for 45 minutes... I have to listen to the same sales speech each time? Jesus..  I'd expect such a terrible insurance service to be free and paid for by your advertising revenue.... since I'm not given a choice.

Review.Titre: Need to shorten the process
Review.Contenu: There were numerous times the operator put me on hold for well over ten minutes. The signal was breaking up and sometimes I couldn't understand what she was saying. For something that I thought was going to take 10 minutes took well over 40. For having my information on the phone in front of her. I understand she had to confirm the phone but that also was done numerous times. I'm glad I had the protection plan but this process needs to be shortened a lot

Review.Titre: Being an older person it was very…
Review.Contenu: Being an older person it was very difficult to maneuver through all your rules for replacement. I finally went to the AT&T store where a very nice girl basically helped me fill out the form , scan my ID and sent it off.

Review.Titre: Best way to get service from Asurion.
Review.Contenu: Asurion is so large that trying to locate a printer sold by Staples took days of effort for us to obtain a warranty replacement. For any customers reading this simply start a chat with Asurion, not a live phone agent as they are not trained very well.   Give the chat person the Staples receipt information as they have no clue about serial #s, makes or models of Epson products. The chat agent will attach your model and serial information and finally proceed with the warranty coverage.

Review.Titre: Very very good experience with the…
Review.Contenu: Very very good experience with the people and process the but the phone I received has a battery problem already, the phone was on when I first opened the box, phone gets hot with any charger I use, even the one supplied. And the battery dies extremely fast.

Review.Titre: I've been paying this company $25 per…
Review.Contenu: I've been paying this company $25 per month over 2 years, at times even forgetting I have the service. When I remembered and tried to use the service to repair a PC with a fan problem, they're like 'need to pay $100 for service fees'! I know how insurance works, and this is how they discourage you from using the service you pay for.

Review.Titre: Took 1 hour and 15 minutes to file a claim
