Review.Contenu: I was unable to file using the online process and it took me one hour and 15 minutes of calling and chat to get the claim filed.  I do a lot of computer work, and don't have problems using a computer.  The insurance is good, but my time is important.  It was very frustrating.

Review.Titre: Well I got a new phone through an…
Review.Contenu: Well I got a new phone through an insurance claim for an iPhone 11 Pro Max.  The first one you sent worked for about 12 hours and then all of sudden the cellular data stopped working. Over the course of the next 4 days I had to visit my local AT&T 4 times just to find out the phone is not operational. Finally got a new phone today and it’s set up and running. Just not sure why I have to spend $150 for a refurbished phone when I have been paying insurance for almost 4 years and never had to file a claim. Especially after it took almost 5 days to get a phone that actually works. Needless to say this wasn’t the smoothest interaction with phone insurance.

Review.Titre: Received replacement, but still had issues
Review.Contenu: I received my replacement no problem. However, there was a random, brand new iPhone14 in the box as well. I spent HOURS on the phone being passed back and forth between Asurion and AT&T trying to figure out how to get the phone (that I didn't order and they had no record of sending to me) BACK to them.

Review.Titre: This was a very frustrating experience
Review.Contenu: This was a very frustrating experience. We have used the insurance claim process in the past with our watches and it went so smoothly. I was expecting the same great experience, and instead we had nothing but long wait times on the phone, incorrect or incomprehensible directions, an unusable replacement sent, and longer than expect wait times throughout. I was thoroughly disappointed and upset with the whole process.

Review.Titre: It's  not all Asurian
Review.Contenu: It's  not all Asurian. They just have to take care if the mess. Verizon is doing something with their towers. I even had to get a signal extender, even with towers all around. The automated fortress is a terrible idea. People have unusual problems that need a human being. If that continues,  especially with what they charge, I'll change. Other systems are as much as half the price of Verizon with more personal service. I appreciate the response below. It took three days of getting 2nd tier techs and constantly being put on hold, answering the same questions ad nauseum, getting cut off, and starting all over again with the automated questions and options that had nothing to do with my problem. Even by phone, I'd get cut off... three days of this. Finally, a new Sim chip cured the problem... I think."

Review.Titre: Fried Phone
Review.Contenu: After Samsung update my phone never came back on. Help desk was no help. Operators are very hard to understand dialect. Had to pay for replacement phone even though 1. Update destroyed my phone. 2. Repair clinic couldn't fix it. Yet I had to fork out money to get a new phone. Was without my phone/work phone for 3 days because someone had to be home to receive package.

Review.Titre: Good people, bad results
Review.Contenu: Honestly, bad experience. The people I talked with were lovely but the overall performance was bad. I was told the screen of my flip could be repaired, then I was told I had to get a new one shipped. Then the delivery was canceled without any reason given. And when i got the new device, the name on the reciept and return label was wrong. Nightmare experience overall.

Review.Titre: If you aren’t fixing a phone, forget it.
Review.Contenu: We made an appointment and dropped off our ps5. Place was packed with waiting customers. About 30 minutes later we were checked in and our “same day” repair was changed to a week. A week and a half in I called and they hadn’t looked at it because they “had a lot of phones come in which took priority”. The techs were nice but I wouldn’t take anything but a phone to these guys unless I had no other options.

Review.Titre: When we received the phone
Review.Contenu: When we received the phone, we were issued a completely different number.  NOT funny... as this was NEVER discussed during the call, as I would have told them NO..  This is my number that I have had for over 20 years and have NO intention of getting another number.

Review.Titre: "Overnight" wasn't overnighted...
Review.Contenu: The woman I spoke with was helpful in getting me a replacement, however, she explained that I would have the replacement the next day (they were overnighting it). It took an additional 3 days before it was delivered, which means lost revenue for our small business.

Review.Titre: Phone malfunctioned Order was pending…
Review.Contenu: Phone malfunctioned Order was pending for almost a week during a power outage in my hometown. So I went without power and a phone for 5days. Once I finally got a chance to call back,express my frustrations and see what the holdup was,I had a new phone the next morning. Response time could be a lot better.

Review.Titre: I had two claim
Review.Contenu: I had two claim.  One for my 2nd oldest and one for my youngest.   My youngest was a fusion that it swapped to a mesmerize that she is currently using.  I didn't fuss, just went ahead and accepted that instead of another fusion.  My next to the oldest accidentally had his moto stylus crushed and yall were replacing with a galaxy note 9.   That was great except it was not delivered but sent back to yall.  We received the cheaper phone and that is what he is having to use.     It would be much appreciated to hear about this situation and to have a new delivery date for soon.  Thank youDanica Comans

Review.Titre: Terrible support when filing a claim!
Review.Contenu: When you call support for a claim they are terrible.  Had problems uploading personal I.D.  Replacement came promptly once itwe were finally able to process the claim.  Support and transferring data good and easy.

Review.Titre: Not what I expected
Review.Contenu: Received a refurbished device wasn't notified until it arrived.  I also think the sim card could have actually worked without having to make a trip to the store.

Review.Titre: It felt like I was being sent in…
Review.Contenu: It felt like I was being sent in circles to get a phone. I also feel like the point of having insurance is for immediate replacement, especially for something like a phone. Other than that everything went well

Review.Titre: Took too long too repair
Review.Contenu: I have insurance for my Verizon phone through Asurion.  A year ago, my phone stopped sending text messages.  I called Verizon customer support,  which turned out to be Asurion, for help.  I had to start with a low-level technician who had me go through many steps that I had already tried based on information I found on the internet.  After about 45 minutes, he transferred me to a high-level technician who spent more than an hour troubleshooting the problem.   It was late,  and I told him I would call back the next day.  When I did, I got another low-level technician.  I explained what happened the night before and asked to be transferred to a high-level technician.  He insisted that I allow him to troubleshoot the problem.  I reluctantly complied.  After an hour,  he transferred me to a high-level technician.   Keep in mind every time you call or are transferred, you have to wait a considerable amount of time.   I spent five or six days with technicians and did not get my problem solved.  I totaled my time on the phone, and it came to 48 hours.  I called Verizon customer support and explained what had happened.  The Verizon rep was shocked.  He helped me fix the phone and wrote a report about my experience with Asurion. He told me Asurion should have had me go to a Verizon store and arrange to send the phone to Asurion and/or replace the phone.   For my troubles,  Verizon gave me a handsome credit to my account. ,

Review.Titre: Blocked in Georgia
Review.Contenu: Terrible experience.  I as a customer was treated as if I committed fraud.  I was drilled on the phone with personal questions twice to be sure it was me filing the claim and then a block was put on my phone and after an hour on the phone trying to get my new phone connected I was told that I had to go to an AT&T store.  Horrific!  Trust me.  That's not what customers want.

Review.Titre: Greedy
Review.Contenu: I think this company is too greedy in the replacement cost of the cell phones that have been lost or stolen. No matter what the customer has been injured by the lost and then this company adds insult to injury with the replacement cost. I understand this is a business may God have mercy on you because of your greed.  You charged me $249.00 to replace my phone. That is a shame before heaven.

Review.Titre: Asurion bill and took $1170.67 out of…
Review.Contenu: Asurion bill and took $1170.67 out of my Bank account for a phone that has been returned as of today August 4 2023 they have not returned my money I am not Happy with Asurion

Review.Titre: Not great
Review.Contenu: Not great. Your folks relentlessly wanted me to purchase ATT Home Tech instead of helping me transfer from my old phone to my new phone. Consequently, I am now traveling and still do not have my photo gallery loaded onto my new phone. Therefore, I cannot turn the old phone in yet.

Review.Titre: Can't get notifications to set phone up if phone is lost …
Review.Contenu: The replacement phone was supposed to be delivered on Friday. BUT when a phone is LOST and the tech calls that number to let you know that he is on the way, they willmot get an answer as we did not have the phone.  Had to wait till Monday to get the new phone then we could not get it set up as they were sending a verification code to the phone number that we were trying to set up.  Had to take new phone to AT&T store for them to set it up.

Review.Titre: Even though I was afforded 30 days to…
Review.Contenu: Even though I was afforded 30 days to return the original device, I was sent multiple reminders to return it which were all accompanied with threats. Not pleasant.

Review.Titre: Submitted claim on Sunday
Review.Contenu: Submitted claim on Sunday. They said phone would be delivered on Monday. It was not. Then they said it would be overnighted and receive on Tuesday. It was not. It finally arrived Wednesday afternoon. Rep stated I would receive an e-gift card. I have yet to see that come through my email or junk mail. Very disappointed

Review.Titre: Review requested before process is complete
Review.Contenu: I want to continue reading the next steps for my claim and I have to write a review. The process isn't complete so I didn't want to write a review, but have to in order to continue I suppose.

Review.Titre: I was sent a prepaid sim card instead…
Review.Contenu: I was sent a prepaid sim card instead of one that would work with my plan. Unfortunately after two phone calls the problem was not able to be resolved. I had to go to an AT&T store which was an inconvenience due to the fact that I am without an automobile right at this moment. I am also upset that the charging cord that was sent to me is a double " C "  and I do not have a plug-in adapter for that. I do like the new phone though.  Also the directions for returning my damaged phone are not clear as to which mailing service to use... FedEx was used to deliver the new phone and the return label has both ups and USPS on it. Then there is a pamphlet that says follow the directions to return you are broken product but the directions are really not complete.

Review.Titre: Phone repairman failed to show for the…
Review.Contenu: Phone repairman failed to show for the first appointment and did not bring necessary parts (battery) on the second appointment. Then they acted like they were doing me a favor for doing a refurbished exchange by mail.

Review.Titre: Verizon phones are s#$t
Review.Contenu: Phone freezes could not verify original  problem. Keyboard freezes

Review.Titre: Easy exchange for bad refurbish
Review.Contenu: The process to get the replacement phone was easy enough but the quality of the product received made me end up just getting a new phone all together. So now I'm down five hours of my time and $300.

Review.Titre: It took over 3 hours for me to complete…
Review.Contenu: It took over 3 hours for me to complete everything before I finally got through the mess!! The lady that finally got everything completed was exceptional but it was a NIGHTMARE getting it completed

Review.Titre: Trouble with delivery
Review.Contenu: On Monday, set up for next day delivery, Tuesday, between 3 & 5 because I was out of town.  Received a message on Monday evening that an attempt was made to deliver the phone , but no one was home. (Because I was out of town!). Texted Christian back and  it was agreed that delivery would be on Tuesday!   Well, that didn’t happen either.  Upon calling Asurion, they said they would have the phone overnighted to me & should be there the next day, Wednesday, between 10 & 1:30 and that I would have to sign for it.  So I stayed home with the gate opened waiting. At 2:30, I went to check my mail & found the phone waiting at the gate;  did not have to sign for it.   The whole process was very frustrating to me!  And still had to go to an AT&T store to get it activated.

Review.Titre: I am not a fan of Forced review…
Review.Contenu: I am not a fan of Forced review writing… I couldn’t “X” out of the review or move forward with my order without leaving this review… that makes me grumpy.

Review.Titre: Was not a great experience
Review.Contenu: Was not a great experience, took 1 hr on phone, phone tech should get 5 stars,  could not have done it without her, reason I called was to ask why deductible was so high 249$,she checked it out found out it was only 99$ then help me fill out online forms

Review.Titre: Not enough communication with the…
Review.Contenu: Not enough communication with the delivery guy. I know we had bad weather but he never responded and let me know what was the next step after not receiving my phone and day if delivery

Review.Titre: Play phone tag for days
Review.Contenu: Play phone tag for days, jump back and forth from asurion to att ptotech.Very frustratinjg, if someone can simplify the process that would be great!!

Review.Titre: It took 1 week to get my phone
Review.Contenu: It took 1 week to get my phone. I had to resubmit the claim 3 times before the phone was finally sent to me. The Asurion representative had no explanation for why this kept happening.

Review.Titre: After contacting AT&T with my lost…
Review.Contenu: After contacting AT&T with my lost device. I was told by AT&T they were going to blacklist the phone. I don’t know what that is. They then sent me to your company to file a claim. Your representative while Att was on the phone with me answered the phone said a few words very rude and hung up on AT&T and myself. The next representative we had told me they could not do anything with the phone and make the claim because the phone has been disconnected?? AT&T still on the line with me said no it isn’t. Your company said we cannot file a claim on a device that is not working. I said you guys are crazy, AT&T blacklist the number in case somebody was using it.  And your company decides they can’t file a claim on a device that is not online and working. I am very confused😩

Review.Titre: THE SPEAKER HORNS ARE NOT HEARD…
Review.Contenu: THE SPEAKER HORNS ARE NOT HEARD CORRECTLY AS BEFORE, one thing was repaired but they broke down my SPEAKERS.

Review.Titre: Before I started my claim the ATT agent…
Review.Contenu: Before I started my claim the ATT agent told me multiple times that it would only cost 29 dollars beause i had asuion, but it actually cost more than 120 dollars.

Review.Titre: Original phone was stolen. Not impressed with business-line service.
Review.Contenu: Original phone was stolen. Filed a claim. The "expert" arrived pretty late to our house...I was trying to get the kids to bed. The phone she brought was defective. She called the Verizon help line (we have AT&T), then after bungling a couple more attempts, she provided me no less than 3 phone numbers to call. By the time we figured out the correct number to call, the call center was closed (by 15 mins). So she left and told me I have to call in the morning. I called the number she gave me, was incorrect. Finally figured out the number to call, was then transferred to the business account department. Then I had to complete another claim on the phone that was defective. The phone was sent Fed Ex, not early morning priority. Got the phone late afternoon, set it up and the SIM card wasn't working. Called in, went through the BS and find out SIM was fine, but someone had de-activated the number, so that was fun. Not impressed.

Review.Titre: Different agent, different message
Review.Contenu: Each time I called the agents were very pleasant and helpful. However, the information they provided was not accurate. The first agent said I could receive a replacement phone the same day but after checking my address said it would be delivered the next day. Since I was traveling for work it was sent to my hotel. After 2 days it didn't arrive and now i was checking out. I called and they told me it would be cancelled and i would now receive my replacement phone the next day at home. It took 2 additional days. One agent said they canceled the hotel delivery only to find out from the next agent that it wasn't cancelled. I am glad I called back so it was cancelled after the 2nd call. Good thing because the phone delivered to my home was addressed to wireless caller, not even my name. Not sure what would have happened if it went to the hotel.

Review.Titre: Could not download any of my photos…
Review.Contenu: Could not download any of my photos from old phone to the new one.  Had to install all the Icons using Play Store.  So I lost many of them cuz I finally gave up emailing them to myself.

Review.Titre: Poor Customer Care
Review.Contenu: The first delivery was to be with IT full setup. The phone was NOT delivered and basically accused of stealing the phone. I was asked 3 times to check my front door while on the phone to see if it was there. I have multiple cameras and NO delivery happened. The second delivery did come days later. I really am being charged a $250 for this!

Review.Titre: too difficult
Review.Contenu: It took over a week to finally get the order accepted.  It kept being cancelled.  Shouldn't be that difficult, especially when I'm having to pay $225 "deductable"

Review.Titre: Their "hassle free" warranty process…
Review.Contenu: Their "hassle free" warranty process was a lot of hassle and annoyance. Our rep was wonderful but getting to her was a disaster. Would no recommend.

Review.Titre: Your agents  eedagent recommended me to start a new…
Review.Contenu: The agent recommended me to start a new claim  my email was wrong on my account. I had to use my personal computer to change my email address. I couldn't change it on my cell phone.

Review.Titre: The lady I spoke with first was saying…
Review.Contenu: The lady I spoke with first was saying I’m calling comcast then said no sorry this is att and she wasn’t very helpful and spoke really fast. Seem like she just wanted to hurry and get off the phone

Review.Titre: The live chat went well
Review.Contenu: The live chat went well.  The problem was the my Verizon pin requirement for verification.  Our Verizon account doesn’t have a pin so there is no way for me to begin filing my claim

Review.Titre: Pool pump purchased 3/20/2022 through…
Review.Contenu: I'm updating my review. I fought with Asurion and after several emails and a review, they refunded my total purchase price. I shouldn't have had to fight,  but I'm glad I did.  I've now bought a replacement pump.Pool pump purchased 3/20/2022 through Amazon, with this insurance. Pump stopped working 12/6/23. Contacted this insurance. They want me to ask the manufacturer what parts they need to order, then send the pump to someone for repair. I'm in Florida. My pool is now a beautiful shade of green, but it's of no concern to ASURION. They won't authorize a replacement pump. I will NEVER trust this insurance EVER AGAIN

Review.Titre: Placing a claim system is confusing
Review.Contenu: I had very much difficulty trying to place a claim on a warranty product. I spent way too long on on the phone . The system should make it easier if a product is has is under warranty should be able to communicate the claim whether to return it or get a replacement or get it repaired without having to spend half the day on the digital product my phone. Thank you, Joseph.

Review.Titre: You better have plenty of time and keep…
Review.Contenu: You better have plenty of time and keep all the info on the item you’re buying an extended plan on.

Review.Titre: Insurance Claim
Review.Contenu: My phone broke and I have insurance so I filed a claim and they are sending a new phone in 1-2 days, this is a problem because I use my phone for work and cannot make any calls or texts or receive any calls or texts so 2 days is really inconvenient.  Also since i am a senior I am not clear exactly how it will work to get my data transferred over,  I tried to go in and chat with the service people but website kept wanting me to enter code they sent by text on my cell phone - I can't open my cell phone it is broken which is why I filed a claim.  I don't know exactly what will happen when I get my replacement phone.  I went by ATT store and they said they can't transfer the data when I get my new phone, they weren't allowed to so I don't know how this will work,  maybe I will be updating this review by then. I can't say I am happy with this insurance, I paid out 1200. over 6 years and had a deductible for 112. and they are replacing mine with a phone that came out in 2020 that can be bought for 250.00 so I am out of pocket 1000. which would buy me a current phone so somehow I way overpaid for this replaement phone.  I will see how much trouble it is to set it up when I receive it in the mail and if I can find a way for someone to walk me through it, I may have lost all my contacts and texts on my broken phone.  You have to be tech savvy to get a phone in the mail and do it yourself which is not me.

Review.Titre: Less selling, more help
Review.Contenu: The tech person was trying everything to resolve my issue. His instructions were involved, I was trying to follow his instructions and then a long sales pitch for buying another service was there!! This was not in my best interest at the time!! My problem was not resolved and you kept selling me again! Unhappy long time customer!!!

Review.Titre: Honey did an outstanding job of solving my Canon printer issue after a disappointing first call. …
Review.Contenu: Honey did an outstanding job of resolving the issue in this second call after being on the phone for an hour with Canon. My prior contact with Julian was disappointing and resulted in hours of extra work on my part.  I should have been asked for the error code. the expiration of the Canon Warranty should have been confirmed and this resolution offered immediately.    This has resulted in a delay to my ability to complete my work in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: Can't fix chromebook
Review.Contenu: Dropped off my chromebook amonth ago. No communication so went back in 2 weeks later. They told me it couldn't be fixed and escalated the  case. Was told nd recieved an email that someone would contact me in 1-2 days. No one did. Finally contacted chat support and they got everything done. Though asrion communication was terrible the support chat site was fantastic in resolving the issue!

Review.Titre: Deductible is high if just receiving 3yr old replacement.
Review.Contenu: Filing the claim was fairly simple and straightforward. The $129 deductible is high if I just get a replacement for my nearly 4yr old 2020 iPad--am I getting old stock, refurbished, or a comparable new iPad?! I'll provide an update when it arrives.

Review.Titre: dislike that had a tremendous delay in…
Review.Contenu: dislike that had a tremendous delay in fixing the problem as 2x did request the listed available service (mobil unit) and never showed up , so I lost time and money waiting on them.I liked that the place was sent or only close choice to pick were very pleasant and quick to fix the issue(screen).

Review.Titre: Not quite right
Review.Contenu: Even with insurance it cost me $275 plus almost $100 to replace screen protector, camera protector, phone cover.Also I had bought a new phone, insured a new phone, they sent a refurbished phone in place of my insured new phone and gave me no color choice and sent a different color. Frustrating and doesn’t feel right.

Review.Titre: Samsung galaxy S22 ultra 5g cellphone…
Review.Contenu: Samsung galaxy S22 ultra 5g cellphone screen cracked. Repair was done quickly next day service although i had to drive 1hr and 30 min away to Panama City Beach Florida due to parts back order and the 2 stores within 20 -30 minutes Fort Walton Beach and Pensacola could not repair.  Replacement /repair took 3-4 hours.

Review.Titre: The replacement phone I've receives. PLEASE HELP
Review.Contenu: The replacement phone I've received seems to have several issues. Most common ones are glitches that just causes phone to crash out of apps constantly throughout the day, as well as acting very leggy over all. I've done basic troubleshooting on the device as far as ensuring all softwares, apps are current and up to date, I've reset network setting, and even factory reset the device and re-set it up. All issues have persisted..

Review.Titre: Windows is not an operating system
Review.Contenu: Windows is not an operating system, it is software and that is not a physical part of your machine so it is not covered. Please be aware!

Review.Titre: Asurion has definitely helped, but, at a high price!
Review.Contenu: Asurion has definitely helped me when I needed it the most. I just wish there were more options. Instead of having to pay such a large deductible ,Or keeping a damaged phone, either way it's extreme at best

Review.Titre: not a great experience this time around
Review.Contenu: I believe I have used this provider before with success, but that hasn't been the case this time around. Not sure what is happening with communications, but I'm not receiving anything and I've had to reach out 3 times to be told each time 2 business days for my resolution. A little frustrated. Also can't remember where to find a phone number where I can speak to a person, I've had to use the chat feature twice. Which the chat is fine, just takes longer.

Review.Titre: Got a nice replacement phone
Review.Contenu: The process for replacing my lost phone was fairly quick and easy, but delivery took longer than promised.  The phone is an upgrade because my exact model was not available, and that was nice.The charger that I received with the phone does not work.

Review.Titre: Okay for insurance but shaky on warranties of you are no longer with Verizon.
Review.Contenu: They are fine for insurance and covered several losses. They also seem expensive.Then i had a warranty claim, but i was no longer with Verizon, and many agents claimed falsely that my warranty was void. I finally got my replacement, still warrantied, but watch out for these guys in this area. They are poorly trained. I had to escalate to get to a knowledgeable person

Review.Titre: Yes I did receive a replacement phone…
Review.Contenu: Yes I did receive a replacement phone and it is a good phone thank you. But it took 4 days which was very long. With my physical limitations I truly needed it much sooner. There was not a way for me to indicate . Tthis need and request it so I just had to wait. I hope this can be an added feature in the immediate future.I hope they will stop aggressively trying to sell something called home tech. That was attemped by 3 different reps and too aggressive but the 3 rd rep was way too aggressive with it.For these 2 reasons my experience was less than stellar.

Review.Titre: you can hire people who understand what…
Review.Contenu: you can hire people who understand what no means. yourservuce in fast shipping was great. but no one checkthe packageto ensureit was a complte phone it had no battery or simcard.

Review.Titre: First I’ve made 4 trips8/28-8/31 to Verizon…
Review.Contenu: First I’ve made 4 trips to Verizon store to get the phone to work properly.I’ve been trying to install my email address with no success.I keep getting warnings of about to be shut down and was told Verizon security is very good I’m still evaluating that.your help icon is almost unreachable which is very frustrating

Review.Titre: Be very careful!!!
Review.Contenu: You better be paying close attention to what they are saying. The agent tried to slip in their new higher price coverage plan and trick me into upgrading. Thank god I was paying close attention. Then when I said NO, she kept on pushing it and trying to make me upgrade. I had to keep repeating “NO I want to keep my current plan” over and over. According to the people at the cellphone store, they have done this and worse to multiple customers.

Review.Titre: Have the Protection Plan, but charged for device replacement under this Plan
Review.Contenu: I dislike the fact I pay for the Protection Plan but there is not option to “repair the device” u set a claim, and I HAVE to choose replacement device with a $99 charge. What’s the Protection Plan I am paying for ? Very unsatisfactory. I wouldn’t recommend this to others.

Review.Titre: Didn’t deliver timely
Review.Contenu: We were asked to set a date for our replacement device to arrive at our house by a Asurion delivery driver.We received a phone call the day of delivery stating it would arrive 5-7pm. Originally it was scheduled for 1-3pm.The device didn’t show up by 7pm so I called to get an update only to find out it wasn’t going to happen at all that day.I was asked to choose a different delivery option which was only going to be the shipping method.

Review.Titre: It's been bumpy to get them to make my insured weed eater to be replaced
Review.Contenu: It's been bumpy to get them to make my weed eater right as far as being insured. The lady I talked to today acted like she actually knew what she was doing, I believe the rest of them are smoking rabbit tobacco. But Marigold did an excellent job and she deserves a very high rating. This is not judging her this is just warning you what I went through over getting a simple weed eater replaced. It took 2 months to talk to the right person.Marigold =10 the rest of them get a negative 10 that work there.

Review.Titre: Broken microwave
Review.Contenu: Scheduling is not convenient for customers Repairs are very slow No parts in stocksNot what I expected when I started this program

Review.Titre: Convenient, but now my phone has a new issue
Review.Contenu: Hello, it was easy to set up an appointment and the convenience of having someone come to my home and save me a trip to a repair place can't be argued with the only issue I have is this: I had my broken screen repaired and now my power button is all wonky. It nearly sits flush with the frame of the phone and feels "squishy" not as clucky as before. I tried to not let it bother me, but seeing as how I press this 1 button every time I go to use my phone, it's been bugging me ever since my repair. Everything else turned out great but, with the power button issue it was just almost perfect. I'm unsure if I should reach out to have them fix the issue or make a new claim.

Review.Titre: Not a great experience
Review.Contenu: Price to get a new phone was still moderately high for an older refurbished phone in an ugly color and the amount we pay to have the insurance per month. Agent that came to the home was unprofessional and rude to the att employee on the phone in front of myself and my kids. Then walked out of the house saying you deal with it.

Review.Titre: Too many steps unnecessary time wasted to complete the claim…
Review.Contenu: Processing the claim immediately will help make the customer experience easier. Tell the customer to wait for a call or an email to move forward in the claim is dragging out the claim process. There are already security measures in place to help make sure you are who you say you are. The email to upload necessary info should be sent immediately after filing the claim as long as the customer has verified all necessary information.

Review.Titre: I thought the process went well overall…
Review.Contenu: I thought the process went well overall and timeframe was better than expected. I am disappointed that I did not get the exact reason the phone could not be repaired. It worked fine except the screen was cracked. When I called Asurion for my options I was just told it was damaged beyond repair which I disagree with. I also followed the instructions exactly before sending the phone for repair. And the replacement phone did not have the 256 GB as my original phone. It only had 126 GB.

Review.Titre: Process took way too long
Review.Contenu: Process took way too long. Three phone calls and about 3~4 hours on the phone was not necessary. Could have been done in 15 minutes. Ultimately device was replaced and shipped out quickly.  Color wasn’t what was expected and White watchband isn’t an acceptable color. Support people were helpful and friendly.

Review.Titre: Better than nothing but read the fine print
Review.Contenu: Fiirst off, the company is very responsive and easy to work with.  Claims are processed without much issue except their website can be buggy but then you go to chat for tech support who immediately resolves that for you.After so many phone losses over the year, I decided to get insurance for the first time.  While I'm glad I did, I'm not totally satisfied but it's better than getting nothing on a phone loss.  Here's the fine print you don't realize until you go thru a claim:1) you have to pay a $49 deductible2) I bought my phone and insurance on Amazon so the refund is in the form of an Amazon e-gift card3) that means you have to get a new phone on your own dime first to transfer from the old phone (if it's still working) or to even have a new phone (some of us can't live long without one).4) that e-gift is not sent to you until you send back the old phone and they verify that it's really broken, i.e., time delay.Bottom line, factor in the cost of the insurance plus the deductible plus the cost of the phone.

Review.Titre: I was told at th AT&T store after my…pricing was one thing then told another price by the service.
Review.Contenu: I was told at th AT&T store after my account was looked up, that my deductible was $200, but when I entered my claim it was $299. I truly dislike being quoted 1 thing and then told its significantly higher later. It is really hard to believe that I after I watched the store look up my account then told my deductible is almost $100  more later is acceptable to your practice. I must say I feel duped. I should have to pay anybody to dupe me. If it was mistake on either the store or the service, that's something that should never ever happen.

Review.Titre: Deceiving service claims!
Review.Contenu: Company claim that the service will be complete in less than 3 hours and then states on another page it may take up to 24 hours in which it did.  Also the company claims phone replacement the same day and then on another page that it may take up to 3 to 5 business days.  Which it did.  Just tell the truth upfront and don't oversell your product.

Review.Titre: I like your prompt service!
Review.Contenu: I like your prompt service. It was very fast and your representative was on time and courteous however your agent could not successfully transfer data from my damaged phone to the new phone.

Review.Titre: great folks could be organized better
Review.Contenu: They get the job done, but it often takes a while.I would recommend picking a shop and having a relation ship with those technicians. Asurion has lots of options to get repairs but I have had techs sent the wrong parts and sometimes scheduling is unavailable for in person stores through the online claim filing. They employ very helpful people, but the coordination could use some fine tuning.

Review.Titre: It would be nice when I'm told that if…
Review.Contenu: It would be nice when I'm told that if the screen is cracked the deductible is $5 dollars and if the phone is broken the deductible would be $99. It turns out that my screen was cracked and for some reason I was charged the deductible for the broken phone and I think I should be refunded 94 dollars

Review.Titre: Not a Reasonable Option
Review.Contenu: I didn't like the fact the only option I had to get my phone repaired was to get a new phone. The inside screen malfunctioned, and I was offered a new Fold 5, instead of getting the old Fold 4 repaired. That bill is now $270+ dollars

Review.Titre: I was unable to find from my Verizon…
Review.Contenu: I was unable to find from my Verizon app where to start a claim. There is so much advertising, not enough information at a glance to take care of business. Verizon chat was not helpful. Phone lines to get thru to Verizon were already closed for the day. It would be very helpful if there was a link to asurion from the my Verizon app that is easily visible. This process that took 25 mins to complete once I found where to start overall took me 3.5 hours.

Review.Titre: I as a customer at AT&T
Review.Contenu: I as a customer at AT&T, pay good money for their product but each time I called I talked someone different and got a big run-around, so everyone needs to know more about their job and the product, I think most are there just to make a pay check . These prices are just a bit to high!!

Review.Titre: Asurion has misplaced stores
Review.Contenu: Asurion has many outlets around the Portland, OR, area, but NONE to serve the east and southeast metro regions.  Like Apple stores, they seem bunched together to the west and north ignoring the fast-growing southeast metro, like Happy Valley.

Review.Titre: Just wanted battery replacement
Review.Contenu: Phone tree made it difficult to talk to someone and ask questions.  I just wanted to fill out the online claim and take my phone to the repair shop for a battery.  There was no option for this on the form and not offered when I called Asurion.  Instead, the phone was replaced and the new phone’s battery appears to be weak.

Review.Titre: I still haven't received my phone
Review.Contenu: I still haven't received my phone.  The girl was more intent on selling me another protection plan than taking care of my issue.  I hope she ordered my phone.

Review.Titre: Was not told properly the correct…
Review.Contenu: Was not told properly the correct amount of getting 2 phones replaced. I was quoted $99 total for both but then after the transactions they said I needed to pay another $99 for the other phone. This is unexceptable. I am not happy.

Review.Titre: Newer replacement phone disappointment
Review.Contenu: Newer replacement phone’s volume is awful. Phone doesn’t even hold a charge for 24 hours; frustrating. Received an email that the replacement was being shipped. A few minutes later another email said it was on back order. I got it fairly quickly though.

Review.Titre: Mother's memories GONE!
Review.Contenu: Replacing the phone is okay but the information on the phone was priceless. Unfortunately we didn't know my mom's email password so we pretty much just have a phone. All the memories we had of her through her eyes are GONE!!! I called and asked for help but no one helped me to just locate the stolen phone. Yes i tried to submit a police report but because the phone wasn't stolen from my property and my possession I was given the run around. I gave the phone to my brother to upload our mother's content to a hard drive but the phone, my mother's ashes and a few other electronics were stolen.

Review.Titre: Asurion insurance on my cell phone
Review.Contenu: I pay for insurance in case of a problem.  I want quick service and not be tossed to multiple associates.  I spoke with 9 associates before they resolved my issue.  Each time the same questions and answers.  They each tried to sell me another insurance.  Will I have to go through 9 associates to get a resolution with that insurance also???

Review.Titre: I've been with the company since 1997…
Review.Contenu: I've been with the company since 1997 or so and I have had the insurance since then.  What bothers me is every time you get a replacement phone after something goes wrong with your phone you're charged anywhere from $125 to $150.  With all the money I have paid throughout the years, I should have been able to get another phone for no more than $50 since the replacement phone is a refurbished phone.

Review.Titre: Think of your customers
Review.Contenu: While trying to make a claim the website was either going down or it was being mainteneced. I could not get in for several hours. If there is going to be maintenence done on the website do it during hours that are not as busy with people such as myself who desperately need their phones for business and other emergency situations. Think about your cuustomers, we should be able to get in quickly, make a claim and have it resolved within a timely manner. Not have to wait several hours to even enter the information due to a maintenece issue with the website. We pay for this service and should have the right to quick service.

Review.Titre: Hard setup
Review.Contenu: Fast with shipping the replacement device and return process is easy. I do not like the new simless phones that the old one was replaced with. It was too hard to get it set back up to start using and the online tech help was hard to follow as well. Plus, the agent kept trying to sell me stuff when I was clearly frustrated and told her no no multiple times. My son also lost all of his contact information and AT&T was unable to recover it. I usually do not have any issues with Asurion but this time I was frustrated for sure.

Review.Titre: Great service once I was able to connect!
Review.Contenu: I had a hard time getting through to file for a claim, but once I did, your agent/representative was excellent. I would have left a 5-star rating, but before I linked to the review page, I read that I need to take my package to a UPS location - which is a 40 minute drive from my house.

Review.Titre: I've been with this insurance carrier…
Review.Contenu: I've been with this insurance carrier for over 15 years. Had a few claims but I never had to upload anything. It was a little difficult for me lack of printer and phone or scanner. The company is great I understand the reason why you request all the information but 3 days without a phone is longer than what I expected. Thank you for your service.

Review.Titre: EVERYBODY WAS EFFICENT AND GREAT…
Review.Contenu: EVERYBODY WAS EFFICENT AND GREAT SERVICE,JUST THE PAGE WEB WAS NOT WORK CORRECTLY AND I HAVE TO WAIT FOR LONG TIME TO PROCES THE CLAIM,THE CUSTUMER SERVICE WAS VERY EFFICENT AND RESPECT.FOR YOUR TIME AND ATTENTION THANK YOU GREAT TEAM CUSTUMER SERVICE IN THIS TIMES IS HARD FOUND THAT.

Review.Titre: The jury is still out on Asurion
Review.Contenu: The jury is still out on Asurion's service itself, but the customer service by "Delresha" was stellar, as she went above and beyond to try to accommodate my needs.But I find that it's always so easy for companies like this to take the money, but make you jump through a hoop or two when it's time to actually put the coverage to use.Asurion is no different. I have paid into it for a full year and just as I need to use it for the first time, I have to take the long route to get it done. Still, I am happy that Asurion's service is available.

Review.Titre: I had to repeat myself over and…
Review.Contenu: I had to repeat myself over and over,explaining the entire sad story and was denied twice. Staff more concerned about selling me another phone instead of using the insurance I pay for each month.08

Review.Titre: After spending hundreds of dollars on…
Review.Contenu: After spending hundreds of dollars on an iPhone and paying for insurance, THE VERY LEAST, the company could do is to provide in-store FREE service to set the phone up. I think it is ridiculous to charge $30 to set up the phone. I had to spend over an hour on the phone with a representative to set the phone up, and I STILL ended up having to get help at the Apple Store in Charlotte. I had to travel approximately 1 1/2 hour each way to seek help.

Review.Titre: Only a great service if you plan on…
Review.Contenu: Only a great service if you plan on protecting expensive items not worth submitting claims for low-cost items under $150. It's kind of a shame since those are most likely the items that are to give out the soonest. Would still recommend it for a piece of mind.

Review.Titre: Be careful if you have to finish your claim with live agent
Review.Contenu: Be careful if you have to finish your claim online with an agent.I just completed a claim and over the phone he read me the legal rights on this claim and then wanted me to verbally agree. when I asked again what my verbal agreement was to he was trying to sell me a $24.99 total home insurance package instead of my initial $7.00 insurance that is on my cell phone. So be careful and do not verbally agree at the end of your phone claim.

Review.Titre: The service tech just showed up to…
Review.Contenu: The service tech just showed up to repair my daughters phone even though I received two correspondences confirming cancellation of the appointment due receiving a new phone. The tech also said the phone number listed was all 1’s, even though I was assured my phone number 607-237-5554 were listed as contact info. We have received notice that my daughter Must return the phone after her personal stuff is removed and the phone turned off. However, the screen will not allow her to do either one! What are we supposed to do. The tech that was here suggests we take it to 607tech to have that done for $39.00. Please respond asap

Review.Titre: I spoke with your representative
Review.Contenu: I spoke with your representative, I believe, Wednesday the 17 to file a claim. I was informed the replacement would be delivered between 7-9pm on the 18. No call and no delivery. I called the 19 was told delivery was the 21. Finally, Monday it arrived!! The 22.  It was returned Via UPS on Thursday.   You need to do better with the information on delivery at your customer service

Review.Titre: Instructions that arrived with the…
Review.Contenu: Instructions that arrived with the replacement phone were confusing and thus setup was frustrating. The ins program is great for cost, but the re-setup of the new phone and the shutdown of the old phone were confusing.

Review.Titre: Disappointing: New iPad was not working today.
Review.Contenu: AIt was disappointing that my new iPad could not be made to work. I would like to know what was wrong in order to avoid such an outcome next time.

Review.Titre: I love the convince of the appointment…
Review.Contenu: I love the convince of the appointment service coming to me. Unfortunately, the tech who fixed my screen actually cracked/broke the back cover to the bottom corner of my phone in the process.

Review.Titre: The company had a professional helping…
Review.Contenu: The company had a professional helping me trying to get my two week old replacement phone working correctly. He did the best he could to get the phone functioning properly when using the calling option. Thank you Justin!

Review.Titre: Replacement phone model changed during check out.
Review.Contenu: Model of replacement phone changed in the middle of checking out.   I've paid for this service from the inception of moving over to Verizon on my lines. Not a good way of doing business.

Review.Titre: Asurion raising rates with no notification
Review.Contenu: Had been paying Asurion $50 a month for insurance on phones I already owned. They decided to try and get another $10 a month out of me so I cancelled the plan all together. Not a very good business plan to try and milk more money out of your loyal customers. Very disappointed!

Review.Titre: Not been hassle free
Review.Contenu: All was going great but when I used the return box and label and dropped off the box at fed ex drop box it came back to me with my return label covered with a new label code 889 tendered with out barcode. So I have to call back and I guess get a new label sent to me, sad I live 3 hours from where the phone is…so I guess another trip down to the kids so I can get this dang broke phone back…this has really become a hassle!

Review.Titre: Great insurance got everything handled…
Review.Contenu: Great insurance got everything handled pretty smoothly but there was some communication issues they sent my confirmation and tracking info to the wrong email so I wasn’t informed of when my phone would be delivered or that I had to sign for it. They also forgot to send me a SIM card for my phone so I had to drive over an hour away to the nearest AT&T store

Review.Titre: This latest experience with Asurion has my rating of customer service/support fall from excellent to very poor.
Review.Contenu: I'd have to rate my aggregate experiences with Asurion as a neutral.  I've had 4 or 5 very good experiences with claim service and support.  This most recent claim is a total zero in terms of satisfaction.  I usually have to make between 2 and 4 calls per incident because of issues with the call center's phone system. This most recent incident I've had to make 6 or 7 calls due to disconnects and finally due to a non-delivered replacement phone.  The ultimate disappointment was being told that I would have to call back to re-submit the new ship to address after that address had been "validated" by Asuriuon - whatever that means in Asurion-speak.  It's strange that I'd have to re-submit an alternate shipping address some 24 hours after having submitted that new ship to address.  An almost Kafka-esc task to perform.

Review.Titre: I like the fact you can talk to live…
Review.Contenu: I like the fact you can talk to live people and the security aspects What I don’t like is the phones are not inspected by technicians before you ship it out people don’t like receiving a phone from insurance companies that don’t care what they send it seems you are out of touch with the items you insure

Review.Titre: Bare minimum service/product
Review.Contenu: Asurion use to go beyond the call. No more. You will only get exactly what you pay for and less.  The $200 deductible gets you a $200 refurbished phone. Add what you pay for insurance. Not a bargain especially if you rarely need it. It’s good to have a phone waiting but nothing special at all about this service

Review.Titre: I didn’t have enough time to do the…
Review.Contenu: I didn’t have enough time to do the things that was ask to do because every time you go to get your answer you have to go back and start over again and then you lose your connection

Review.Titre: Waste of time with no retention offer.
Review.Contenu: Why is Asurion trying to intervene in my self-management of the services on my Verizon mobile phone account? I don't even know what 'Asurion' is! Are they tech support? Not curious enough to find out. I just wanted to cancel one of my Verizon services for now.

Review.Titre: Don’t loose phone !!
Review.Contenu: Prompt help when I reported my phone. And when I received replacement there was confusion. When called to explain I found my phone in my house I called talked to agent she told me return replacement. I want my phone service restored. Please!I am a senior (72 years old) with Diabetes and my Dexcom is through my phone. Please!

Review.Titre: I feel the representative cared more…
Review.Contenu: I feel the representative cared more about adding Home Protect to my account instead of helping me with the activation of my phone in a timely manner.  I explained I needed to speak to my fiancé about adding this to the plan but he said it needed to be added before we hung up. The activation of the phone took much longer than it should have.  I was receiving notifications about the process and I would let the representative know and he would tell me that it was still processing on his end and would keep drilling me about adding the Home Protect Service to my account.

Review.Titre: I was sent 2 defective devices and have…
Review.Contenu: I was sent 2 defective devices and have been without a functional iPad all week. I now have to wait until the 2 defective devices arrive back to you before I can get another device. Needless to say I am not happy.

Review.Titre: Calling Asurion back is not easy
Review.Contenu: Talked to ATT rep regarding my broken iPhone.  Asurion was quick.  Should have had my iPhone in two days but the delivery guy texted my husband and said he was not able to deliver that day then… and to contact Asurion to set up another day.  That’s the terrible part.  It was not a direct number to this delivery guy.  There were many numbers pressed and even then a waste of a lot of time to actually speak to someone.  The delivery happened the next night at 8:30pm.  On a Saturday night.  And the delivery guy would have helped me set it up if I was actually home.  Instead my 90 yo mother accepted it at my house.  It was fairly easy to set up.  Thank you.  All people I spoke to were kind.  I appreciated that.

Review.Titre: Disliked repetitive sales pressure
Review.Contenu: I disliked the repetitive sales pressure from each person I talked to to sign up for whole house coverage for tvs and computers.  If I want it I will ask for it.  I do not appreciate being continuously pestered with questions as to why I do not want it multiple times before processing my claim by two associates and then again by another associate when assisting me with setting up my replacement phone.

Review.Titre: Getting a replacement phone was fast…
Review.Contenu: Getting a replacement phone was fast and easy! But getting my phone up and running took at least 8 hours over 2 days. It still isn't working as it used to. The text messages that I send to my family who have iphones used to blue and now they are green. Also, the last time I got a replacement phone from Assurion, I decided to trade it in since Verizon was running a special on the new iphone13. When I sent it to Verizon, they claimed that there were things wrong with it and didn't give me the trade in value they had offered. That was the only reason I traded it in! I had no interest in spending that much money on a phone!

Review.Titre: This was almost a five star review
Review.Contenu: This was almost a five star review!  It as SO EASY to file the claim and my new device was delivered within 72 hours (over a weekend)  Everything about my device and coverage popped up immediately and the claim process was simple online.....but then the device came with an eSIM.  I was not able to set it up on my own.  I had assistance from two assurion protech people who were also not able to set it up.  In the process, both my old phone and the new phone were not functional and I ultimately had to go into an AT&T store where they were not able to set it up either!  They ended up putting in a "hard" SIM card and I was finally back in business.  Would have been easier to have had that in the first place.  Everyone I interacted with was nice and professional but the experience ended up being 5 hours of frustration.

Review.Titre: Need to greatly improve services…
Review.Contenu: Need to greatly improve services related to our ‘Liberty Mobile’ subscribers here in Puerto Rico since they purchased all services and facilities from AT&T two years back or so. I was especially affected when told that my phones’ serial number and emei numbers did not match even though I have the original carton my phone came in + AT&T purchase receipt.

Review.Titre: Quick replacement but high deductible
Review.Contenu: Very easy to deal with and quick to replace my damaged iPad. The only negative aspect was the high cost of the deductible. 30 percent of retail seems mighty expensive for an insurance deductible.

Review.Titre: Lesson learned the hard way
Review.Contenu: I liked everything except the whole you have to remove your account from a broken iPhone. If you have no other apple devices and no trusted phone numbers your F'd. Lesson learned I got help by apple. Never do that again. I'm new to applem besides that insurance was great.

Review.Titre: Clearly Asurion uses the gauntlet…
Review.Contenu: Clearly Asurion uses the gauntlet strategy of making it exceedingly difficult to file a claim.  I answered the automated questions multiple times and spoke to 3 people before actually getting to a claims person who helped me.  No the phone was not dropped in water….the phone doesn’t have a battery issue.But in any case, I stayed with it and filed the claim.  The phone arrived a day later and the conversion process seemed to go fine.  It would have been nice if there was an option to upgrade the phone at the same time since I had to pay a 250 dollar deductible anyway.  The final person to help me was very good and when I told her what I had to go through she apologized but it seemed  this is the standard process and had made this same apology to everyone she speaks to.I would say the experience was fair overall.  I have a replacement phone and that was the reason for having insurance.

Review.Titre: I got my phone replaced the next day…
Review.Contenu: I got my phone replaced the next day for 99.00 if i waited for a week it would of been free, because I have the insurance that Verizon offers but who wants to wait a week for their phone.plus I got the liquid screen protector, that says if you break your screen they will pay up to 200.00 to repair or replace your phone screen if you have the insurance but you got to register the screen protector after purchasewith them. It's a hassle to get reimbursed but they said it will be here in in about a month. I guess I will see if my check comes to me or not. If it does I will be really surprised and will continue to stay with this company.

Review.Titre: I transferred from Spectum to Verizon
Review.Contenu: I transferred from Spectum to Verizon, I thought I was all set when I picked up my new phone from the store.  Then I was unable to use the new phone because my transfer was not properly setup.  I have to call back to make sure Verizon will take care of this.  It would be nice if I do not need to call back to do this.  To make it worse, the port center will be open at 9AM.  I cannot wait to make this new phone to work.

Review.Titre: Scheduled appointment, arrived to find location "closed indefinitely"
Review.Contenu: I submitted a claim and made my appointment online. I took time off work and drove 30 minutes to the appointment location to find the door locked and a sign reading "This location will be closed indefinitely due to staffing issues." Thankfully, I had another phone with me that allowed me to edit the appointment to another location, because me phone was unusable. I then had to drive to the other location 40 minutes from the original appointment location to the new one and over an hour home. My phone was fixed in less than 2 hours and works perfectly, so very happy with service, but it's frustrating that I was allowed to schedule an appointment at a location that isn't currently in business.

Review.Titre: I do not want the updated version I want the 2022
Review.Contenu: I last time they sent me the updated version and I didn't like it plus I couldn't find a case for it so this is the second one that I have dropped and smashed the glass I wanted a 2022 they sent me the 2023 nobody had the case

Review.Titre: They replaced the screen on my phone…
Review.Contenu: They replaced the screen on my phone but the new screen is too short and the fingerprint sensor isn't working. I'm getting the run around about getting it fixed

Review.Titre: No local repair contractor
Review.Contenu: Asurion changed their repair model. They used to send a mobile repair contractor to your home to fix the phone. This time I had to drive over 20 miles to a contract repair facility.  The phone was repaired and the contractor was great.

Review.Titre: Did not like that the system was trying…
Review.Contenu: Did not like that the system was trying to send me to a location that had stock on back order and no idea when they were going to have the item needed for my repair. I had to make all the calls to find a screen and have it to a somewhat local location for the repair

Review.Titre: You cancelled the first shipment of my…
Review.Contenu: You cancelled the first shipment of my replacement phone. You were more interested in up selling me a warranty on other devices. Talked too fast and poor english

Review.Titre: I would have liked a chance to read the…
Review.Contenu: I would have liked a chance to read the whole privacy disclosure but I felt that as long as I could cancel at any time it made me feel more comfortable.

Review.Titre: One person give me wrong instructions…
Review.Contenu: One person give me wrong instructions and I have to contact again to be sure and instructions was wrong second person correct that and specify

Review.Titre: technician repaired my cracked screen but... 😡
Review.Contenu: The technician did repair my cracked screen on the front glass, but while taking the phone apart he destroyed the color on the back glass. so my first problem is fixed, but he left me with a new problem. I'm not happy at all about that. I'm sure it will devalue the amount of the trade-in on my phone.

Review.Titre: Pls be aware your reimbursement isn't…
Review.Contenu: Pls be aware your reimbursement isn't always the price of the product currently. It the current Market amount they deem valid. I was offered $345 for my disk PS5 and they are still $499. Just issues like that.

Review.Titre: Simplicity
Review.Contenu: I liked the customer service man that assisted me.It took us quite a while to complete claim together.He never gave up ,He gets an A + for his patience

Review.Titre: Your Customer Service dept
Review.Contenu: Your Customer Service dept. could use some training in talking with people on the phone.  I talked with four different people on given days and two of them were RUDE. They need to listen to customer and help them, whether it be to change day and time or place.Your techs that come to the house to help or mine was awesome!

Review.Titre: The people I talked to on the phone at…
Review.Contenu: The people I talked to on the phone at Asurion were very courteous and helpful.  However, the process to get a cracked screen which rendered the phones functionality was way to cumbersome and the time span to get it fixed was not good especially if you need your phone for your job as in a delivery person.  My experience was to make an online appointment for a cracked screen was 6 days out for a delivery person that is 6 days of no work.  So we tried to show up at the facilities listed on the online service to do a possible walk in which I know they do with some companies other than AT&T some of these places were not even repair services and they didn't even support phones only new phones. Please note this didn't happen in a small-town area either.

Review.Titre: I have used asurion for years and have…
Review.Contenu: I have used asurion for years and have been for the most part pretty damn good. Not so much this past round. I am always 100% honest when making a claim and this last time was no different.I left my office for lunch, checked my phone I had in my pocket twice and it was fine. Get to the restaurant order my food and sat down. Pulled out my phone and it was cracked. I DID NOT bump into anything, drop my phone or anything else for that matter. It was in my pocket the whole time. So when I go to make my claim no questions asked about details. The guy says the screen is broke and we can fix it for free but it'll take a long time or we can replace it for $99.00. I told him that I didn't do anything for it to have broken, he didn't care.Something had to be wrong with the phone for it to have cracked the way it did. I also forgot to mention that it was in a case and had a screen protector.

Review.Titre: Resolved my issue
Review.Contenu: Resolved my issue, just took longer than expected. Overall great though.

Review.Titre: Amy was amazing.
Review.Contenu: Amy worked hard to resolve my printer connection issue. She guided me through several trouble shooting options.Ultimately I had to restart my phone, it did a system update, and it works again.

Review.Titre: Got the approval for the repair!!! Hopefully it gets fixed!!
Review.Contenu: Overall, not a bad experience.  Just come prepared with links to all your receipts for items and Asurion plans!  If not, you'll be struggling to keep up!  And give yourself plenty of time; the approval process took 20 minutes of hold-time on the chat for me!

Review.Titre: Customer Service
Review.Contenu: Cynthia helped me the best she could but was unable to do my request as my account is business.

Review.Titre: A good experience for the most part
Review.Contenu: The order experience was very smooth and I chose to pick up the phone in person, it was ready within 90 minutes of my order.  The transition from old phone to new went pretty well but I always have a long time downloading data because I'm out of town on a satellite hookup with middle speed choices.  Still things are going along well enough.  I did have to call tech support for help with some issues; the tech was patient and helpful, she managed to solve most of the issues quickly.  The one issue is still about downloading my photos and apps - it just takes time.  I'm willing to wait a day or so and see how things go but right now I'm satisfied with how things are progressing.  All in all, this experience was a good deal less painful than in years past.

Review.Titre: Orlando was great to work with
Review.Contenu: The online chat help desk person "Orlando" was great.

Review.Titre: The everyday life of the human being in…
Review.Contenu: The everyday life of the human being in a society of people who are in love 🥰

Review.Titre: Technical support was good at understanding how to resolve the problem
Review.Contenu: The technical support was great at understanding what challenges I had in setting up my new phone. She quickly and accurately explained what to do next.What I did not appreciate were the multiple interruptions to try to sell a protection plan to me. I would have liked to read the particulars about that another time, not while concentrating on setting up the new phone.

Review.Titre: When you purchase policy the policy is not For everyone
Review.Contenu: Well, to be honest, it will be easier if you personally are speak to someone in person

Review.Titre: Filed the claim...now, waiting on the Claims Team.
Review.Contenu: I haven't received the claim review but, the service representative, Patrick, who file the claim for me was efficient and very helpful.  I wasn't able to file the claim online due to technical difficulties with the system reading my bar code and then not being able to enter in a date earlier than the current month so, I used the online "chat" feature and had the pleasure of getting Patrick to assist me.  So far, so good.  Hoping to get a smooth resolution to my office chair dilemma by the Claims Team and will update the review once I hear back from them.

Review.Titre: Catherine was helpful to a certain…
Review.Contenu: Catherine was helpful to a certain point.  I still had to call the 1800# for Verizon because there were questions that only be could answered by a Verizon Rep

Review.Titre: The site gave me some issues since it…didn’t give the correct option for my item
Review.Contenu: The site gave me some issues since it wouldn’t show the item I was replacing. It didn’t give the option for air fryer at all, although the system shows that’s what was insured. Nevertheless, I used the chat option and was assisted expeditiously and efficiently.

Review.Titre: Dealing with the manufacturer was a…
Review.Contenu: Dealing with the manufacturer was a long drawn out pain. I’m so glad I bought this protection plan. Asurion was very reasonable to deal with.

Review.Titre: Tech coach
Review.Contenu: The agent that I texted with gave me exact steps to take to fix the problem on my phone although I have not yet tried them I'm hoping that it will work.

Review.Titre: Repair delay…
Review.Contenu: First of all if the clerk at the store would've told us that we had to send the money before they can do anything to it it would've been sent already without hesitation but she didn't so now it's taking longer than expected to get the console fixed.

Review.Titre: Second experience
Review.Contenu: This is my second time working with Asurion. Today's interaction was fine. Employee was courteous and respectful. It would help if the employee was able to work solely with one person at a time. I had some lengthy pauses in my chat, I assume due to her working with other people at the same time.

Review.Titre: Easy to submit claim and quick procedure..cost more than it should though
Review.Contenu: PHONE CHARGER PORT WAS DAMAGED AND PHONE WOULD NOT CHARGE EXCEPT ON WIRELESS PAD. FILING CLAIM WAS QUICK AND EASY. UNFORTUNATELY IT COST $100 DOLLARS TO GET REPLACEMENT PHONE AFTER PAYING 20+ DOLLARS A MONTH FOR INSURANCE. STILL OVERALL A GOOD DEAL AND HIGHLY RECOMMENDED BECAUSE THESE PHONES DON'T LAST TO LONG WITHOUT ISSUES IN MY EXPERIENCE

Review.Titre: great costumer service, but....
Review.Contenu: great costumer service, quick to help and get your issues resolved, but they do have limitations on where they can help you. hopefully you are still able to use your phone while you wait for a new one, if not you will be without a phone for a couple days.

Review.Titre: Quenella helped me to reset my phone…
Review.Contenu: Quenella helped me to reset my phone after I contacted Verizon Coach. She was good but too preoccupied to ask if I had other questions. She left before I could ask about another issue. I wanted to know if y’all send gifts as rewards for our service experiences. Or is this Spam also?

Review.Titre: The person I spoke to was Daisy Rey
Review.Contenu: The person I spoke to was Daisy Rey.  She helped me learn about a product that I had and yet I knew nothing about.  Daisy was very knowledgeable and very professional with our conversation that was over a phone conversation.   Daisy the only reason I rated you a 4 star and not a 5.  Alway room to learn and educate.  Thank you Daisy you were great!

Review.Titre: Fast service
Review.Contenu: Fast service They had a service tech to fix my phone a day after I dropped and cracked screen. I called and they scheduled an appointment asap. I didn't like talking to the automated system.  It ask too many questions.  But overall experience was great and quick.  I'm satisfied

Review.Titre: The repair was great by the tech in…
Review.Contenu: The repair was great by the tech in Huntersville but after spending 2 hours on the phone with customer service accomplished nothing. Tech in Gastonia could not fix but did set up the claim and travelled to Huntersville to get the repair done.

Review.Titre: Great customer service
Review.Contenu: Great customer service with very friendly people. Couple notes on the claim service. After filing a claim a confirmation email with the claim number should be sent to the email provided. Chatting directly with them though provided me with immediate solutions. Overall very solid but some slight areas for improvement

Review.Titre: Claim Process Started Badly, End Well
Review.Contenu: I tried in vain to file this claim by filling out claim form, but it would not accept my CORRECT info. Long story shortened, I got into the chat box thing and was lucky enough to get Rolando to get all this untangled and process my claim request. So what started out not so swell ended well.  Again...THANKS TO ROLANDO.

Review.Titre: Asurion should have helped with data transfer
Review.Contenu: Asurion should have told me to go to the store on Mayfair Rd. In Wauwatosa to have them attach a temporary screen so all of my data could be transferred. When I did this on my own, Jeanetta did A FANTASTIC JOB of transferring all my data and activating all my apps so my new phone has everything and I didn't loose anything during the switchover.

Review.Titre: Chat activation
Review.Contenu: The chat rep was so patient and efficient h

Review.Titre: Very good😀
Review.Contenu: Very good excelente

Review.Titre: I have 2 claims
Review.Contenu: I have 2 claims. There seems to be too much confusion as to when workers are coming. I received text & replied yes, that I would b available. When an unknown # calls my phone it goes directly to VM. This makes it confusing for the technician but I texted & phoned several times to ASURION that I would b available. Too many phone calls for 2 claims. Dates of service get changed & it’s frustrating.

Review.Titre: Concerned about placing my claim
Review.Contenu: I was not sure how Asurion would handle my claim,because LG phone devision is out of business as of this past July. However Asurion was very professional and placing my claim on line was extremely easy. My replacement phone arrived in 2 days. Thank you

Review.Titre: Website a little tricky
Review.Contenu: The website was a little tricky to use . The town I live in uses mailbox delivery and apartment living I rely on my postal box to receive items because your site doesn't accept postal boxes I had to contact by phone to finished my claim.

Review.Titre: Live Agent(online) was very attentive…
Review.Contenu: Live Agent(online) was very attentive and helpful, along with Tech support and Agent on phone. They were all respectful, efficient and took their time to serve and make sure I was okay.

Review.Titre: Honestly a while back I was using…
Review.Contenu: Honestly a while back I was using Asurion to make a claim on my phone and it was a little difficult, I would have been paying 300$. Now it’s like an updated version and just easy to navigate. Legit easy to use and gets your claim done in seconds.

Review.Titre: What to expect with phone downtime.
Review.Contenu: To begin with, having the insurance coverage is the way to go. Today's fast pace and wanting everything done yesterday causes accidents. I do know me and being able to replace my phone is important. For me, it's like my brains or a least my memories are in that phone.

Review.Titre: Convenience of dropping phone off at local repair shop
Review.Contenu: Customer service was very helpful over the phone, but it took a while to get through all of the phone prompts to speak to an actual person. Love the convenience of being able to drop phone off at a local repair shop and that there is no longer a deductible to fix a cracked screen.

Review.Titre: Support team handle my problem with…
Review.Contenu: Support team handle my problem with grace and understanding. I truly appreciate the timely response thank you so much good day.

Review.Titre: Worth minor cost
Review.Contenu: Def worth cost of protection w/Amazon third party seller.  Time consuming process from emails, texts and chats however final result satisfactory

Review.Titre: I attempted to file a claim 3 different…
Review.Contenu: I attempted to file a claim 3 different times today and was directed to chat each time. The previous 2 times was disconnected or assistance failed. My 3rd attempt was a great experience. Jaymee was able to assist and processed my claim in less than 10 minutes. Thank you again Jaymee

Review.Titre: Went to Verizon tech help.
Review.Contenu: Went to Verizon tech help and ended up with Asurion help. I’m fine with that. Online help was gray and fixed my problem seemingly immediately. Time will tell how long the fix last so I reserve giving the highest rating.

Review.Titre: Overall it was easy enough experience…
Review.Contenu: Overall it was easy enough experience to go through to get a new phone after my other phone was stolen.The people I dealt with over phn were courteous and seemed genuinely sympathetic to help me throughout process

Review.Titre: These guys are great
Review.Contenu: These guys are great! Sometimes they have some rough edges but they really do provide great insurance on all your devices in the house and on the go! Thank you Asurion!

Review.Titre: Very helpful with activating my…
Review.Contenu: Very helpful with activating my replacement device! The claim process took more time than I would have liked. But everyone was extremely polite and helpful with the problems I had and getting my replacement device set up and going.

Review.Titre: 24 HRS!  Claim filed and replacement received!
Review.Contenu: The online claim process was very simple and quick.  It was in disbelief that I had the claim filed and in less then 24 hours my replacement was delivered to my door.  To be honest, this situation has been one of the most stressful because I depend on my cellphone for work and hated that it was no longer workable or dependable.  However, that's on my side of this story.  On the flip side, my total experience with Asurion and my device claim was very minimal with regards to time spent filing all the way to turning on my new replacement device. Less than 24 hours!  There were not a bunch of forms or hoops to jump through and that is the way it should be.  More companies in any  field or industry could learn from Asurions claim processes,etc.  THANK you all very much.

Review.Titre: The website made filing my claim easy…
Review.Contenu: The website made filing my claim easy and stress free and anyone who has broken their phone will tell you stress-free is exactly what you need when you rely on your device.

Review.Titre: Customer service
Review.Contenu: The customer service was outstanding from start to finish. Very helpful, polite, and stayed with me from start to finish. I even got disconnected and the young lady called me back right away. I was on the phone with her at total of 4 hour or more. She was very patient with me. The help, which most of it was from the Phillpienes, were the best.

Review.Titre: Keep banging away
Review.Contenu: Keep banging away.  Best Buy failed twice.  Samsung failed twice.  Verizon failed twice to fix the problem.  Now I'm buying an upgrade.  See how that worked out for everyone?????????

Review.Titre: Tech support was above averageaverage
Review.Contenu: Tech support was above average. Patience was very good. A great help to the novice person using these devices and having issues. Just remember we really are lost and appreciate your patient support.

Review.Titre: Helpful just waiting game now for my…
Review.Contenu: Helpful just waiting game now for my phone been trying for three weeks one phone call from Asurion and boom just like that it’s on the way

Review.Titre: My Representative Kendrick made the…
Review.Contenu: My Representative Kendrick made the process work great. He did say that my cost of my replacement was different but he did get the job and stayed on the line until the claim was submitted properly. Big ups to Kendrick.

Review.Titre: Great experience
