Review.Contenu: My experience was fantastic!  The service was great! Very nice very professional and punctual.  My only suggestion is to have better time slots hence the 4 star instead of 5.

Review.Titre: Super easy but a little expensive
Review.Contenu: It was super easy to submit a claim online. I could either send my phone in to have the screen replaced or pay my deductible and get a replacement. I chose the replacement and it was here the next day. My only complaint is the high deductible, given the price I pay for the insurance, and that the phone is already paid off.

Review.Titre: The agent was very helpful
Review.Contenu: The agent was very helpful. She answered all of my questions and guided me through the process of setting up my phone very efficiently.

Review.Titre: Great service from the representatives
Review.Contenu: I received great service from both of the representatives that I spoke to. Both were patient, professional and courteous. My issue was resolved reasonably fast. Thank you.

Review.Titre: Easy to use anybody can do it as long…
Review.Contenu: Easy to use anybody can do it as long as you follow the easy instructions. The only issue I would say I have a problem with is after paying monthly insurance the coat of the phone replacement is higher than expected.

Review.Titre: Now days it seems as if most insurance…
Review.Contenu: Now days it seems as if most insurance companies do everything they can to screw a person out of their money. So far I haven't found that to be the case with these people, however, I'm not done dealing with them yet, so we will see.Till then i have to say they've done a good job

Review.Titre: Very easy to do.
Review.Contenu: I was concerned about security on my phone due to some banking issues. Relieved to find that the phone is safe and working properly. Very helpful.

Review.Titre: I am really happy to have Asurion.
Review.Contenu: I am really happy to have Asurion or I would not have a working phone today.  All the websites and misdirection took hours out of my day, but I finally got a satisfactory result.

Review.Titre: I ran into a glitch while attempting to…
Review.Contenu: I ran into a glitch while attempting to file a damage claim report but it was quickly resolved to my satisfaction with the assistance of a claim's expert via chat.  I was initially unsure about purchasing this warranty service but am now glad that I did and am likely to do so in the future with less hesitancy.

Review.Titre: I thought I would speak with a live person…
Review.Contenu: I thought I would speak with a live person. as I wanted to ask you to track where my phone is, so I could go get it and not have to enter a claim at all. I do not know why this option is not available, as you must know where the phone is at any given time, so that you can bill me properly for its use.

Review.Titre: Error corrected
Review.Contenu: The deductible is pretty steep when you pay $50 a month.First replacement phone was incompatible with our carrier according to rep in Verizon Store.  So that lead to a multitude of holding minutes.  After reaching someone it had to be checked with higher ups.  You, Asurion, gave us the wrong phone, there should be no question if you replace it with a correct one.  Also replacement phones are refurbished.After checking it was ok 👍🏼 to get another replacement compatible with our carrier.It did get to us the next day.  We do appreciate prompt service and following thru, but I’m uncomfortable with receiving a phone that didn’t work with our carrier and then having it questioned whether or not we were entitled to a replacement that WAS compatible.It’s a good service to have and ended well, but the parts in the middle make me open to another insurance service that would be above this sort of error, and lack of policy that dictates a correct phone replacement is the goal.

Review.Titre: The representative was great
Review.Contenu: The representative was great. But the salesman did not explain the 30 day waiting period for claims when I purchased it though. This was the problem I encountered.

Review.Titre: Good peeps at Asurion
Review.Contenu: I have to say that ALL the people at asurion were exceptionally NICE and easy to deal with. However, with ATT not sure about—I feel we were lead in wrong direction at times

Review.Titre: claim was made with speed and…
Review.Contenu: claim was made with speed and professional assistance.  devices where fixed in a timely manner. thank you sincerely for getting the kids back up and running!

Review.Titre: The tech was knowledgeable friendly and…
Review.Contenu: The tech was knowledgeable friendly and solved the problem it is now connected. They come to chat at reasonal time.

Review.Titre: Everything is fine
Review.Contenu: Everything is fine, however the only thing you would need is to be assisted in Spanish.  Otherwise it is an excellent service

Review.Titre: Reaching Out for Assistance
Review.Contenu: The screen prompts didn't work so I had to use the chat feature.  The person(s) I chatted with were very helpful and were able to resolve my issue.  I'll know for sure if my issue has been resolved w/in 24hrs. as that's the time frame given for my refund.

Review.Titre: Super fast and easy
Review.Contenu: Super fast and easy. A few questions and boom, replacement phone arrived less than 24 hours later. A bit pricier than I expected but I guess its the nature of the beast with tech these days.

Review.Titre: Misleading instructions
Review.Contenu: The instructions for transferring data to a new device say that step 1 is to backup to iCloud. This is misleading because there are other ways to do this. I would have had to pay for more space just to backup all of my data to iCloud but I could easily backup to my PC for free.

Review.Titre: The survey wasn't overly protracted
